column3: Apfi pfipfo pfatuumanya unoghelo pfauli, Yesu Kiristu katulapfila twetwe ughima wake. Na twetwe tuwalapfile ughima wetu ndughu tsetu.

Tsaikala ichihungo che Ipasaka ng'ana chipfike. Yesu tsakamanya saa yake ya ukuka kulawa iisi ino na kughenda kwa Aba wake ipfika. Tsakawanoghela ng'ani iwanu wake iwali muisi, kawalangusa unoghelo wake ing'autsigha bae.
Angu tsina nani Imulungu yawonele maya kwa miyaka makumi mane? Kawonela maya awala iwatendile nzambi, ng'uli tsawo tsatsenela kunyika.
Muwe ka iwana iwohulika, mleke kukala kwa kuwinza keli tsitamaa tsihile ka hala hamkalile ng'ammanyile ukweli we Imulungu.
Kwaapfila Imulungu kawatenda iwanu wose waleke kutegheletsa, ili yawonele libatsi iwanu wose.

Nihulika ka litsi ililawile haghatighati ha pfilumbe wala wane, tsalilonga, “Chibaba chimwe cha utimbo we ngano kwa sendi ya maliho gha tsuwa limwe, na pfibaba pfidatu pfa shayili kwa sendi ya maliho gha tsuwa limwe. Lekeni uleke kuhinya ghamafuta wala idipfai!”
Mwihulumse hambele he Imtwatsa, naye katsowenulani.
Kwaapfila Imulungu keka litsuwa hayatsoihinya iisi kwa haki kwa imunu yula iyamsaghule. Kawatenda iwanu wose wamtoghole kwa kumtsilihula imunu ayo.”
Asikali wabota fiya ya tsimiwa walika mwitwi mwake. Kuya wampfatsa lighwanda lye chindewa.
Apfo nobama pfitsuka awala si wanzee bae wakwelighwe, wapate iwana, na walolese kaye tsawo ili waleke kuwatenda wanebe wetu walonge mbuli tsetu pfihile.
Mnoghole haniwalongela nene namghati mwa Aba naye Aba kamghati mwangu. Ka ng'utoghola imbuli yangu, toghola pfinu pfanitendile.
Lifwa na kutsimu tsapfasighwa kune tsimbu lye ghumoto. Litsimbu lye ghumoto ilyo lifwa lya keli.

mana ing'awile apfo, Kiristu ang'adununzighwe mala nyingi kulawa isi hailumbighwe. Lekeni sambi matsuwa agha ighali habehi kutsigha, yeye kalawila mala lumwe hela kuleghusa nzambi kwa nambiko ya lukuli lwake imwenyegho.
Kwa miyaka ka alubaini kawadudumila akula kunyika.
Apfo ndughu tsangu, hatwitingana hamwe ukuja ichijo che Imtwatsa, chila munu yambete myaghe.
Kuya nilola, Mwanang'olo habandule gundi ya sita, tsakukala na mdedemo mkulu ghwe isi, litsua liwa titu ka ghunila titu na lwetsi lwose luwa ludung'u ka idamu.

Kwa kumtoghola Imulungu iwapinga wamwenga tsawoyitsighwa iwanu wawo iwafile iwatsilihulighwe. Wangi wawo tsawadununzika mbaka wafa, waleka kutoghola kulekelighwa ili watsilihuke na kwingila ughima unoghile.

Lekeni Pauli kawalongela iwakulu we asikali, “Watutowa hambele he iwanu hata ka ng'atutendile totso, na twetwe twa Waroma, kuya watwika mwigheletsa. Lelo wobama watulapfe chinyelenyele. Bae! Leka watse watulapfe iwenyegho.”

Kwaapfila malaghitso ghano, “Uleke ughoni, uleke kukoma, uleke kwiba, uleke kutsulukila pfinu pfe iwanu,” na malaghitso ghangi ghose, ghamna laghitso lino limwe, “Umnoghele miyagho ka pfawinoghela ghumwenyegho.”
Imunu wowose iyomlolela Kiristu, ketenda mwenyegho yele ka Kiristu pfayelile.
Lekeni mghati mwangu ghendo noghadeng'elela ghamalaghitso gha Imulungu.
Mdeng'elele kwilunga ne Imtwatsa ghamatsuwa ghose. Nolonga keli, deng'eleleni!
Tsanihunduka nimwone iyang'ali yolonga na nene, hanihunduke mbona pfinu saba pfa nzahabu pfa kwikila pfitasa.
Angu Imulungu helahile, “Ng'awatsakwingila mbe hanu hangu ha kubwihila,” yang'ali yowalonga tsina nani? Yang'ali yowalonga awala yang'awamuhulikitse.
Iwanu wose iwanongole tsawabapfi na wabokaji, lekeni wang'olo ng'awawahulikitse bae.
Mwemwe iwatumwa muwahulikitse watwatsa wenu kwa kuwapfuka, si awala iwanoghile ne iwahole waliheka, ila hata awala iwali wakali.
Kuya wawaghala iwakalangama we ughutsu iwalongile, “Imunu yuno ng'oleka bae kuhalonga pfihile hanu hano haenzeluke na kughalonga pfihile Ghamalaghitso gha Musa.
Agha ghose ghalawa kwe Imulungu iyatulamlitse twetwe naye imwenyegho kubitila Kiristu na kutwing'a ing'onde yo ukuwalamlitsa iwanu ne Imulungu.
Ndughu tsangu, muwakumbuke manabii we Imulungu iwalongile kwa uwetso we Imtwatsa. Mwighale nawo ka pfawadudumile mne maghayo.
Ne imunu wowose iyatsolomba kwa taghwa lye Imtwatsa katsokombolighwa.’
walonga, “Amina! Ukutunyighwa, utunitso, nzewele, mighede na uwetso na ngupfu na bapfu pfiwe kwe Imulungu wetu, ghamatsuwa ghose na ghamatsuwa ghose! Amina!”
Mleke kwihamba kwa kunze kuliheka, ka kusuka tsimvili tsa ukugholija na kupfala nzahabu na ghamaghwanda gha bei ng'ulu.

Lelo uleke kona chinyala kupeta mbuli tsa Imtwatsa wetu, wala uleke kona chinyala kwaajili ya nene yanyohighwe kwaajili yake, ila ududumile hamwe na nene kwaajili ya Imbuli Inoghile, kwa ukwapfilighwa ne ingupfu ye Imulungu,
Nelapfa imwenyegho kwaajili yawo, ili nawo welapfe ghendo kuna ghweghwe.
Lamka! Ghaghume ngupfu aghala ighasighale kuna ghweghwe ighali habehi kufa. Kwaapfila mbaka sambi sina mbone ka sang'ano tsako tsitimila hambele he Imulungu wangu.
Malaika wa kadatu kakutula ibakuli yake mne imito na mne tsimbwibwi tse ghamatsi, nagho ghaghaluka ghawa idamu.
Kwa ukutoghola kwetu, Yesu katughala kune uluso we Imulungu, na bila kupfuka twololela utunitso we Imulungu.

Mana mpfimanye ghendo ka kuduhu mghoni wala imunu wowose yehile, wala munu iyosulukila pfa wayaghe, mana iyosulukila pfa wayaghe keghala ne imunu iyotamanila pfinyagho, na imunu wowose iyeghala na awo ng'atsopata chinu mne undewa wa Kiristu na Imulungu.
Kwa kumtoghola Imulungu Abrahamu hakemighwe aghende mne isi iyalongile Imulungu katsomwing'a, koka mne isi yake kuya ng'amanyile ang'ali yoghenda kwani.
Mleke ukupatika, kwaapfila ukupatika kutsomlongotsani mtende ghehile bila kwalangula itsokuwatse, ila mmemesighwe Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka.
Iwanu wengi watsouwinza ughoni wawo, na kwa kutenda apfo, inzila ya kweli itsolighighwa.
Apfo kwa achila chayatendile Kiristu, twetwe wose Wayahudi na Iwanu we isi tsingi twodaha kumghendela Aba kubitila Ghumuhe yumwe Mwenzeluka.
Ka pfatuwaandikile iwanu iwali si Wayahudi iwamtoghole Yesu, wobamighwa waleke ukuja ipfijo ipfitambikighwe kwa ipfinyagho, waleke ukuja idamu, waleke ukuja imnyama iyabotighwe na waleke utsinzi.”
Petiri kamghutsa, “Ananiya, ebali kumleka Setani yengile mmoyo mwako, na kukutenda umghutsukile Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka, kwa kupfisa sendi tsingi tsupatile kwa kuhutsa mghunda?
Apfo ng'atutsakuwa keli ka iwana wadowado, iwodaha kukunughitsighwa kuno na kuno na kukweghighwa na chila libeho lya ghamalangulitso ghe iwanu waghutsu iwowaghitsa wangi.
Angu ng'ammanyile bae iwanu wehile ng'awatsouhala bae undewa we Imulungu? Mleke kwighutsukila, si waghoni wala iwanzinzi, wala iwowatamanila pfinyagho, wala awala iwowasa ne iwamale weyawo,
Kuya tuleke kuleka kwitingana hamwe, ka wamwenga pfawatendagha, ila twighume ghumoyo na tughendelele kutenda apfo, ghendoghendo ka pfamkona litsuwa lye Mtwatsa lya habehi.
Apfo mchikome chila chinu chihile ichili mghati mwenu, ughoni na kutenda ghehile, dong'o na ghamawatso ghehile, na batsu ilighala ne ukutamanila ichinyagho.

Lekeni twetwe ituli we imisi, twitawale wenyegho. Tupfale inoghola ne unoghelo ka lighwanda lya chuma lyo ukwikinga mna tsimbagha tsetu, na lolelo lye ukombotsi liwe ka kofiya ya chuma yo ukukinga matwi ghetu.
Mana Imulungu ng'atwing'ile bae muhe wa kututenda tupfuke, ila muhe wa ingupfu na wa unoghelo na wa ghumoyo wa kwilongotsa wenyegho.
Imunu ang'alonga kommanya Imulungu, lekeni ng'oghakinda bae ghamalaghitso ghake, imunu ayo ka mghutsu, na kuduhu ukweli mghati mwake.
Lelo muimemelese indeng'elo yangu kwa kuwa na watso limwe, unoghelo umwe, ghumoyo ghumwe na mwalangule chinu chimwe.
Kuya wabama kumghogha, lekeni kuduhu imunu iyagholose ghamoko ghake kumghogha, kwaapfila litsuwa lyake tsang'ana lipfike.
Walaghitse watende ghanoghile, watende mbuli nyingi tsinoghile, na wawe waluso na weyandae kuweng'a iwanu wangi ipfinu pfawo,
Wamwidika, “Ka ng'atendile totso tung'alekile kukughalila.”

Ayula iyakona litsuwa limwe lidegheta, ayo kotenda apfo kwa kumtunya Imtwatsa. Ayula iyakuja chochose chila, naye kotenda apfo kwa kumtunya Imtwatsa, kwaapfila wolonga mighede kwe Imulungu kwa chijo chayaweng'ile. Ayula iyolema kuja pfijo pfimwenga, ayo kotenda apfo kwa kumtunya Imtwatsa, naye kolonga mighede kwe Imulungu.
Lolelo lyenu liwatende mdeng'elele, hane maghayo mdudumile na mleke kwipfa ukulomba.
Kuya kamlaghitsa imkulu we asikali yamlolese Pauli, lekeni yamlekele chidogho, na yawaleke sale tsake wamwapfile.
Yane unoghelo kodudumila ghamatsuwa ghose, kotoghola ghamatsuwa ghose, ghamatsuwa ghose kololela bila kwipfa, kodudumila ghamatsuwa ghose.
Ghamaandiko Maenzeluka gholonga, “Tsanitoghola, ndo mana tsanilonga.” Na twetwe pfipfila kwa muhe uhula wa ukutoghola, twotoghola na twolonga.
Wandughu twowalomba muwakanye awala iwali wadebwe, muwaghume ghumoyo awala iwali wogha, muwapfile iwalihela ingupfu, muwadudumile wanu wose.
Kuya malaika wa tano kakutula ibakuli yake mchanya mwe chighoda che undewa che imnyama yula mkali. Ichisi chighubika undewa we imnyama ayo, ne iwanu wadafuna milimi yawo kwa usungu iwawonile,
Na wose iwotoghola apfo, tindiwalo na uluso pfikale nawo, tindiwalo na uluso kwa Waisiraeli, iwali iwanu we Imulungu.
Imunu ayo tsakakala kalangulitsighwa Imbuli ye Imtwatsa, na kwaapfila ghumoyo ghwake tsaghukala ghwakwaka, kalangulitsa mbuli tsa Yesu pfinoghile, hata ka tsakamanya ubatitso wa Yohane uliyeka.
Apfo, chochose chamtenda, ukuja au ukunwa, mtende ghose kwa utunitso we Imulungu.

Lekeni mwemwe tsambokela Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka kulawa kwa Kiristu. Na Ghumuhe koghendelela kukala mghati mwenu, apfo ng'ambama imunu wowose yawalangulitse. Kwaapfila Ghumuhe wake kowalangulitsani chila chinu, na ghamalangulitso ghake gha kweli, si gha ughutsu bae. Lelo mghakinde ghamalangulitso gha Ghumuhe na mwilunge na Kiristu.
Ka apfila lukuli bila muhe lufa, pfipfo ukutoghola bila ghamatendo kufa.
Hayamalitse kulonga apfi, kasola chighate, kalonga mighede kwe Imulungu hambele hawo wose. Kuya kachibena, kandusa kuchija.
ila tuwandikile ibaluwa ya kuwalongela waleke ukuja ipfijo ipfihinyighwe kwa kutambikighwa kwe ipfinyagho, waleke utsinzi, waleke ukuja imnyama yabotighwe na waleke ukunwa idamu.
Kuya Pauli kamlongela, “Imulungu katsokutowa ghweghwe mng'enye. Ghweghwe kwa hano kunihigha kwa ghamalaghitso, lekeni ghweghwe imwenyegho koghahinya ghamalaghitso kwa kuwalongela iwanu wanitowe!”
Apfo kuduhu ukuhighighwa kwa awala iwali mghati mwa Kiristu Yesu.
Kwaapfila Imulungu ng'atusaghule bae tukomighwe na maya yake, ila tupate ukombotsi kubitila Imtwatsa wetu Yesu Kiristu.
Naye katsolawa kunze na kuwabugha iwanu we isi tsose itsili muisi mwose, natso tsitsokemighwa Gogu na Magogu. Setani katsowakunga hamwe kwa ng'ondo, nawo watsokuwa wengi ka ghumsanga ghuli kumwani.
Wamwenga wenu tsamkala ka iwanu awo. Lekeni nzambi tsenu tsileghusighwa, mtendighwa muwe wenzeluka na mwikighwa kwa litaghwa lye Imtwatsa Yesu Kiristu na kwa ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu wetu.

na kwa mbuli ayo nodununzika apfino, lekeni sikona chinyala bae, kwaapfila nommanya ayula yanimtoghola, kuya notoghola ghendo yeye kodaha kuchilolesa achila chayangaile mbaka litsuwa lila lya utsighilo.
Mtende ghano ghose kwa kulomba, mumlombe Imulungu yamwapfileni. Mlombe ghamatsuwa ghose ka Ghumuhe pfayamlongotsani. Mghendelele kulomba bila kwipfa kwaajili ye iwanu we Imulungu.

Nene Pauli, Silivani na Timoteo twomwandikilani mwemwe iwanu imumtoghola Kiristu wa ako Tesalonike, iwali mghati mwe Aba Imulungu na Imtwatsa Yesu Kiristu. Imulungu yawatendele uluso na yamwikeni tseghamba.
Uhole wenu umanyike ne iwanu wose, Imtwatsa ka habehi ukuya.
Mana chila hamkuja chighate chino na kuchinwela chikombe chino, mwolipeta lifwa lye Imtwatsa, mbaka hayatsakuya keli.
Wang'alomba kwa ukutoghola mtamu katsohona, Imtwatsa katsomwinula. Ka katenda nzambi yoyose, Imulungu katsomleghusila nzambi ayo.
Nomlongela mighede Imulungu yanimtumikila kwa ghumoyo ghunoghile ka pfawatendile iwabala wangu, nomlongela Imulungu mighede hanikukumbuka ghamatsuwa ghose ichilo ne imisi mna ukulomba kwangu.
Wapfilongela pfidunda na mabambalawe, “Tughwileni mtupfise tuleke kwoneka mne tsinenge tsa ayula iyokala mne chighoda che undewa, na kulawa mne maya ye Mwanang'olo!

“Ayula yane maghutwi gha kuhulika, na yahulike aghala Ghumuhe ghayoghalongela makanisa. “Yeye iyohuma nitsomwing'a ichijo chila ipfisighwe, ichikemighwe mana, pfipfila nitsomwing'a libwe tselu lyandikighwe taghwa lya sambi na kuduhu munu wowose iyolimanya ila ayula iyalibokele.
Kwa tsitamaa tsawo tsihile tsa mali, watsepatila tsisendi kuna mwemwe kwa kuwapetela simo tsa ughutsu. Imulungu tsakalamla kulawa ghumwande ka ang'awahighile, naye ng'awasile bae. Katsowakoma ghendo!
Apfo Imulungu kawaghalila iwanu awo ingupfu ye ukwagha ili wautoghole ughutsu.
Ka pfayandikighwe mne Ghamaandiko Maenzeluka, “Iwanu si Wayahudi waliligha taghwa lye Imulungu kwaajili ya mwemwe Wayahudi.”
Iwanu awo wolema ukweli ka Yane na Yamble pfawampingile Musa, iwanu iwahinyike tsimbutsi na iwalemighwe kwa mbuli tse inoghola.
Imunu wowose iyoninoghela, nomlonga na nomkanya. Apfo uleke ghehile kwa ghumoyo ghwako ghose.
Apfo kwa ukutoghola tutendighwa twahela matotso hambele he Imulungu, lelo twokala tseghamba ne Imulungu kubitila Imtwatsa wetu Yesu Kiristu.
Wilolese ghweghwe ghumwenyegho na ghamalangulitso ghako. Ughendelele kutenda apfo, kwaapfila ung'atenda apfo kwitsekombola ghumwenyegho na iwanu iwokuhulikitsa.

Ghamatsuwa mengi tsaning'ali nighendagha mne tsing'anda tse ukulombela na kuwatowa, kuya tsaniwananaitsa waleke kumtoghola Imulungu. Tsaning'ali niwehila ghendo, mbaka tsang'enda imiji ya kutali kuwadununza.
Ghamatendo ghe soyoka tse nzambi ghomanyika ghendo, utsinzi na wihi na uweghe na
Apfo iyahandile si chinu bae wala ayula iyaimwaghile ghamatsi, ila Imulungu yaliyeka yaitendile yote, iyo imkulu.
Apfo ng'amuhungukighwe bae na ghweko lyolyose kulawa kwa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka, ka pfomumbeta Imtwatsa Yesu Kiristu yaghubulighwe.
Kuya nihulika litsi kulawa kulanga ka litsi lya ghamatsi ighakwitika mwipalu, ka mlungu koduma. Litsi lyanihulike ka litsi lya watowa pfilimba.
Wanabii wose we Imulungu tsawalonga mbuli tsake ka chila imunu iyomtoghola katsoleghusighwa nzambi tsake kwa taghwa lyake.”
Iwanu wala iwoghendelela kutenda ghanoghile aku wobama utunitso na ukutogholighwa na kuleka kuhinyika, iwanu wano Imulungu katsoweng'a ughima wa matsuwa ghose.

Nene Yohane noghandikila makanisa saba ighali mne isi ya Asiya. Imulungu yawatendeleni uluso na yamwikeni tseghamba, yeye yalibaha na yakalile baho na iyatsakuwa baho na kulawa kwa muhe saba iwali hambele he chighoda chake che undewa,
Pauli kalonga, “Ubatitso wang'ali yobatitsa Yohane tsaukala kwa awala iwatoghole kutsileka nzambi tsawo. Naye tsakawalongela iwanu wamtoghole ayula iyakutsa kuchughu kwake, ayo iyo Yesu.”
apfo pfipfo pfaili, Imtwatsa komanya pfatsowakombola mne ghamaghetso iwanu wake iwomnoghela Yeye, na kuweka iwanu ing'awomnoghela Yeye mbaka mne litsuwa lya kuhigha.
Lekeni sambi woibama isi inoghile ghendo, isi ya kulanga. Apfo Imulungu ng'akona chinyala bae kukemighwa Imulungu wawo, kwaapfila kawatendela ghumji.
Lekeni utsileme simo tsila itsili si tsa dini bae na itsilihela mana. Wilangulitse kukala ka pfobama Imulungu.
Tsawanga muisi mwose, na watsitsunguluka kaye tse iwanu we Imulungu, na ghumji agho ighumnoghela Imulungu. Lekeni ghumoto ghuhulumka kulawa kulanga, ghuwalakatsa chakali.
Apfo kalaghitsa wabatitsighwe kwa taghwa lya Yesu Kiristu. Kuya wamlomba Petiri akale nawo kwa ghamatsuwa chidogho.
Kwopfikitsa ghendo ghweghwe kwa imunu yowalongotsa pfifita na kwa chimuli kwe iwanu wala iwali mchisi,
Achi chicho chatulongele Kiristu katsotwing'a, iwo ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose.
Ila ihekima iilawa kulanga tanu idegheta, yonoghela tindiwalo, ihola, yotegheletsa mbuli tse iwanu, imema libatsi na ina ghamatendo ghanoghile, yahela ubaghutsi wala ung'enye.
Aba komnoghela Imwanaghe na kagheka ghose mmoko mwake.
Imtwatsa ng'okawa bae kutenda achila chalongile ka iwanu pfawakona kokawa. Yeye komdudumilani, ng'obama bae imunu wowose yangamile, ila chobama yeye chila munu aleke nzambi tsake.
Nobama iwanu wawe ka nene pfanili, lekeni chila imunu keng'ighwa ne Imulungu ghweko lyake mwenyegho. Munu yumwe kana lino na munu yungi kana lila.
Muubame unoghelo, na mbame pfigholelo pfingi pfa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka, kubita pfose mpate chigholelo cha kuwapetela iwanu usenga we Imulungu.
Imulungu yuyula iyalongile, “Ghumwanga ghulangatse kulawa mchisi,” iyo yuyo iyoilangatsa imimoyo yetu, na kutwing'a ghumwanga wo ukumanya utunitso we Imulungu iulang'atsa mchihanga mwa Yesu Kiristu.
Mne matsuwa agho Myahudi yumwe iyakemighwe Apolo, iyelekighwe Alekisandiliya, katsa Efeso. Tsakakala imunu yadahile kulonga pfinoghile na yamanyile Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka.
Apfo Yesu naye ili yawadeghetese iwanu kwa idamu yake imwenyegho, kadununzika na kufa kunze kwe ghumji.
Lelo, ulangulitse ipfinu apfo na uwaghume ghumoyo na kuwakanya kwa uwetso wose. Imunu wowose aleke kukubetsa.
Na Imulungu kalangusa unoghelo wake kuna twetwe kwa kumghala Imwanaghe nyalimwe muisi, ili tuwe na ughima kubitila yeye.
“Aba, nobama iwanu wala yungaile wakale na nene hanu hanili, ili wawone utunitso wangu. Utunitso yungaile, kwaapfila tsakuninoghela ng'ana iisi ilumbighwe.
Hohose hawoghenda wohinya na woleka maghayo.
Apfo kwaapfila twinaye Mtambika mkulu iyengile mbaka kulanga kwe Imulungu, Yesu Imwana we Imulungu, leka tukindilise ukutoghola kwetu kwatulonga totoghola.

Kwaapfila twetwe tsa twabaho ahala hatogholighwe ne kutunyighwa na Aba Imulungu, litsi halilawile kulawa kuna yeye iyali Utunitso Mkulu, tsakalonga, “Hayuno iyo Mwanangu iyoninoghela, noghelighwa naye.”
Atso tsose sang'ano tsa yuyo yumwe Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka, naye komgholela chila imunu ka pfoyobama imwenyegho.

Malaika wa kane tsakatowa malati yake, na fungu limwe lye mafungu madatu gha litsuwa tsalitowighwa, na fungu limwe lye mafungu madatu lya lwetsi na fungu limwe lye mafungu madatu lya tsinondo tsighelighwa chisi. Na fungu limwe lye mafungu madatu lye imisi tsayahela ghumwanga, na pfipfila fungu limwe lye mafungu madatu lya ichilo.
Nawo wose wamghogha Sostene imkulu we ing'anda ya ukulombela, wamtowa hambele he ichitala. Lekeni Galiyo ng'onile bae imbuli ayo ka chinu.
Kuya wabama wamghoghe keli, lekeni Yesu kaswekuka kawaleka.
Apfo ng'atukuya kuchughu bae, hata ka ng'uli tsetu tsolala, lekeni mghati muhe tsetu tsotendighwa tsa sambi chila litsuwa.
Kuya Mariya kasola isupa ye ghamafuta ighonung'ila ghoya ighalawile mne ghummeya ighukemighwe narido, kambaka Yesu ghamaghulu na kumbaghusa kwa mvili tsake. Ing'anda yose tsainung'ila ghoya.
Kwa kumtoghola Imulungu, Abrahamu tsakakala muhenza mne isi yelaghane ne Imulungu. Tsakakala mne pfibumbulika na Isaka na Yakobu, iwabokele ghaghala ghalaghane Imulungu.
Ndughu tsangu, muwe ka nene, muwalole awala iwowinza ghatuweng'ile mwemwe.
Mwisolele imitsigho, kwa kutenda apfo mtsoghatimitsa ghamalaghitso gha Kiristu.
Mwakona, imunu kakoneka kanogha hambele he Imulungu kwa ghamatendo ghake na si kwa ukutoghola kuliyeka bae.
Lelo tulonge choni? Pfii Imulungu kana ubaghutsi? Aka si pfipfo bae!
Watogholeni awala iwane noghola ndodo, na mleke kughabela ghamawatso ghawo.
Kuya tsakulawila ng'ondo kulanga. Malaika Mikaeli na wamalaika wayaghe tsawetowa na litsoka lila, litsoka nalyo ne wamalaika wake tsawetowa nawo,
Mng'awa na maya, mleke kutoghola maya imlongotseni mtende nzambi, kuya mleke kukala ne maya mbaka litsuwa liswe,
Mleke kuliha lihile kwa lihile au ligho kwa ligho, lekeni muwabaliki, kwaapfila mwemwe tsamkemighwa ne Imulungu ili mbalikiighwe.
Yula iyanitumile kahamwe na nene, ng'anilekile niliyeka bae, kwaapfila ghamatsuwa ghose notenda ighomnoghela.”
Apfo mwime ghoya, ukweli uwe ka msipi mchuno mwenu na unu unoghile ughwe ka lighwanda lya chuma lyo ukwikinga mmambagha mwenu

Aino ano mbuli iipfisike ya tsinondo tsawonile mna ghumoko ghwangu ghwa kujilo, na mbuli ya pfinu pfila saba pfa nzahabu pfa kwikila pfitasa. Tsinondo tsila saba wamalaika wa makanisa, na pfinu pfila saba pfa nzahabu pfa kwikila pfitasa makanisa saba.

ila twomwona Yesu iyatendighwe mdodo kubita wamalaika kwa chipindi chidodo, ili kwa uluso we Imulungu yawafile iwanu wose. Sambi twomwona kapfatsighwa fiya ya utunitso na heshima kwa ukufa kwayadununzike.
kwaapfila ghamatsuwa ghose Imulungu kosang'ana mghati mwenu, na komtendani mdahe kubama na kutenda aghala ghobama imwenyegho.
“Tsaniwalongela agha ghose ili ndeng'elelo yangu ikale mghati mwenu na ndeng'elelo yenu ileke kumala.
Nene Pauli, mtumighwa wa Kiristu Yesu kwa laghitso lye Imulungu Mkombotsi wetu na Kiristu Yesu lolelo lyetu.
Pfipfila nobama iwapinga wapfale kwa mahala, na pfinoghile, na si kwa kusuka tsimvili tsa ukugholija wala kwa nzahabu na lulu, wala kwa ghamaghwanda gha bei ng'ulu,
Yesu kabota ichiboko che lutsabi, kawawinga iwanu wose mne Ing'anda ye Imulungu, hamwe ne iwang'olo ne wang'ombe. Pfipfila katsibidula tsimetsa tse iwobena tsisendi na kutsipwililisa sendi tsawo.
Mana twetwe twa pfilumbe we Imulungu, na kwa kwilunga na Yesu Kiristu, Imulungu katulumba tukale kwa kutenda ghanoghile, ghayalongole kutwikila tughatende.
Sale tsangu, mleke kukangawala kwa maghetso gha usungu ighampata, ka apfila ichinu ichimlawilani chigheni.
Leka tudeng'e na ukudeng'elela, tumtunye, kwaapfila chihungo cho kukwela che Mwanang'olo ma chipfika, na mwehe wake ma keika ghoya.
Muubokele ukombotsi ka ikofia ya chuma, na longa lye Imulungu ka lipanga lyamwing'ighwa na Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka.
Ako kamwona ndughu yake yumwe kotendighwa pfihile na Mmisiri, kaghenda kumwapfila na kwa kuliha chisasi, kamkoma Mmisiri yula.
Lekeni mwemwe wandughu mleke ukwipfa kutenda ghanoghile.
Mkale meso, mwikindilise mne ukutoghola, mwime chilume na muwe iwanu wane ngupfu.

Mwemwe tsa mchighala ichibumbulika cha mlungu Moleki, na ichinyagho che inondo ye mlungu wenu Refani, tsapfikala pfinyagho pfamtendile ili mpfitamanile. Apfo nitsowaghala kune utumwa kutali kubita Babeli.’,
Lelo wandughu, mwime ghoya na mghakinde ghamalangulitso ghatuwapeteleni na ghatumwandikileni.
Imulungu imwenyegho iyo yatutendile pfinu apfo, naye katwing'a Ghumuhe wake yawe nzamana kwa aghala ghose ghayatwikile.
Iwapinga welangulitse mbuli tse Imulungu kwa kunyamala tulu aku wotegheletsa ghendo.
Uleke kutoghola ghamaghomba kwe iwabala mbaka ghaghalighwe ne iwakalangama weli au wadatu.
Mwilamse mwemwe kwa mwemwe kwa ukwinonela ikunoghile. Iwanu wose iwamtoghole Kiristu womlamsani.

Webulughitsa mtimbwisi, walila na ukuyayana, wakemelela, “Koghaya ghwe ghumji mkulu! Kwaapfila wose wane tsimeli tsawawa na tsimali kubitila ghweghwe. Na kwa saa limwe liliheka kwaghisa pfinu pfako pfose.
Loleni unoghelo mkulu wa Aba watwing'ile twetwe, mbaka twokemighwa iwana we Imulungu! Na apfo pfipfo pfatuli. Iwanu we iisi ino ng'awotumanya bae, kwaapfila ng'awammanyile bae Imulungu.

Pfipfila namwe iwasongolo muwahulikitse iwabala wenu, mwemwe wose muwe wahole mna ukwisang'anila, kwaapfila Ghamaandiko gholonga, “Imulungu kowalema iwanu iweghoda, ila kowatendela uluso iwanu yang'aweghoda.”

Mbe, si pfipfo bae! Leka Imulungu yoneke kolongesa, na chila imunu kamghutsu. Ka pfayandikighwe mne Ghamaandiko Maenzeluka, “Chila haulonga mbuli tsako chila munu kakona tsolongesa na hauhigha ghweghwe kwohuma.”
Naye katsa hano ne uwetso kulawa kwe iwatambika wakulu awaghoghe wose iwokutamanila ghweghwe.”

Tsakulawila manabii wa ughutsu mna iwanu, pfipfila watsolawila walangulitsi wa ughutsu mna mwemwe. Iwanu awo watsokwingitsa ghamalangulitso ghe ughutsu ighokoma, na kumlema Imtwatsa iyawaghombole, apfo watseghalila iwenyegho ukuhinyika ing'akukawa bae.
Apfo Wayahudi wabama wamkome Yesu. Tsawabama wamkome Yesu si kwaapfila kalibetsa Litsuwa lya Sabato liliheka, ila tsakamkema Imulungu Aba wake, apfo ketenda keghala ne Imulungu.
Nomtunyani kwa kunikumbuka, ne ukughakinda malaghitso ghaniweng'ileni.
Mana Daudi tsakalonga pfino mbuli tsa Yesu, ‘Tsanimwona Imtwatsa hambele hangu matsuwa ghose Kwaapfila yeye ka habehi hangu Sitsohighisika bae.
Kwaapfila mwemwe mwing'ighwa ughima wa sambi, si kwa mbeghu iikola bae, ila kwa mbeghu ing'aikola, kwa nzila ye usenga we Imulungu une ughima na iukala.
Apfo mwilongele nzambi tsenu mwemwe kwa mwemwe na mwilombele muhonetsighwe. Ukulomba kwa imunu iyomnoghelesa Imulungu kuna ngupfu ya kutenda mengi.
Nowalongela ghendo, imunu wowose iyotoghola kana ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose.
“Hanitsakuka, siwaleka bae mliyeka ka wachuwa, nitsowoyila.
Ona, kuna pfinu pfikulu pfingi. Chamwanduso, Wayahudi tsaweng'ighwa imbuli ye Imulungu.
Mwemwe iwatumwa, wategheletseni iwatwatsa wenu kwa ghumoyo ghose, ka mwomsang'anila Kiristu.
Au koubetsa unoghelo mkulu we Imulungu na ukududumila kwake na kufinya kwake ghumoyo, angu ng'utanga bae ka unoghelo we Imulungu wokulongotsa ili uleke nzambi?
Achi chicho ichitutenda tuleke kupfuka hambele he Imulungu, twomanya tung'amlomba chochose ka pfayobama, yeye kotutegheletsa.
Imulungu yane lolelo, yamwing'eni ndeng'elelo na tindiwalo ka pfamtoghola, lolelo lyenu lyongetseke kwa ngupfu ya Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka.
Hanu hayawambighwe Yesu tsakukala na mghunda we mibiki, mumghunda amwo tsakukala na mango lya kutsikila lya sambi, kuduhu imunu iyatsikighwe mmango amwo.

Imnyama yula mkali kaghoghighwa, hamwe na nabii we ughutsu iyatendile pfihulo hanu he imnyama ayo. Kwa pfihulo apfo tsakawabugha awala iwekighwe chitango cha imnyama ayo, na awala iwachitamanile chinyagho chake. Imnyama ayo mkali ne nabii ayo, wose weli tsawasighwa mne tsimbu ilikwaka ghumoto wa ghamabwe gha baluti aku wang'ali waghima,
Kuya Ghamaandiko gholonga, “Imunu iyokuhila ang'awa na nzala, umwing'e ichijo ang'awa na ng'ilu, umwing'e ghamatsi yanwe. Ung'atenda apfo, kutsomghela chinyala.”

Imbuli ya Kiristu imeme ghendo mghati mwenu. Mwilangulitse na mwikanye kwa inzewele yose, aku mwakwimba tsabuli na nyila tsa kumtunya Imulungu, akuno mwomwimbila Imulungu kwa kulonga mighede mne imimoyo yenu.
Namwe iwamale muwanoghele wehe wenu, mleke kuwa wakali kuna wawo.

Lekeni ka ipinga iyomtoghola Kiristu kana pfitsuka mkaye mwake, leka yawapfile. Aleke kulilekela mtsigho kingili lye iwanu iwomtoghola Kiristu, ili wanu awo iwomtoghola Kiristu wawapfile pfitsuka awala iwalihela chinu ghendo.
Na uno iwo ukalangama, Imulungu katwing'a ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose, na ughima awo wa mghati mwe Imwanaghe.
Imunu iyali ne Imwana we Imulungu kana ughima awo, imunu iyalihela Imwana we Imulungu kahela ughima.
Imwana ang'amkombolani, mtsokombolighwa ghendo.
Lelo nomlombani mghendelele kwighuma ghumoyo kwaajili ya maghayo ghanimdununzikilani, mana agha ghose kwaajili ya utunitso wenu.
kwaapfila wanu ka awo ng'awomsang'anila Kiristu Imtwatsa wetu bae, ila woghasang'anila mada ghawo wenyegho. Kwa mbuli tsawo tsine umta na itsinogheletsa wowabugha iwanu iwanoghile.
Iwanu wano wamemesighwa ghehile ghose, kwiha na ukubunza na chepfu na ukukoma na ughobo na ughutsu na ukudesa na ung'enye,
Lelo aghala ghanoghile ghawing'ighwe ughalolese kwa ingupfu ye Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka iyokala mghati mwetu.
Mana imunu iyohanda kwa soyoka tsihile itsili mghati mwake, katsopfuna ukuhinyighwa, ila iyohanda kwa Ghumuhe, katsopfuna ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose kulawa kwa Ghumuhe.
Mleke kumghetsa Kiristu ka iwanu wangi pfawamghetsile, wose tsawafa kwa kulumighwa ne wanzoka.
Imunu yane unoghelo kana mahala, ng'abamagha bae mbuli tsake mwenyegho, ng'asumkagha bae kona maya, kuya ng'ekagha bae fondogholo mmoyo.
Mmambagha mwawo chighubikwa chinu ichoneke ka lighwanda lya chuma na litsi lye ghamabawa ghawo tsalikala ka litsi lye mituka ya falasi wengi iwoghenda kwing'ondo.
Ka sitsile bae na kulonga nawo, wang'alongile wahela nzambi, lekeni sambi ng'awodaha bae kwiyamila ka wahela nzambi.
Muwe ne inzewele pfamkala ne iwanu ing'awomtoghola Kiristu, muitumile ghoya nyafwasi yamwinawo.
Kwaapfila twomanya unu wetu wa ghumwande uwambighwa hamwe na Kiristu mne msalaba ili ngupfu ye nzambi mlukuli mwetu ihinyighwe, ili tuleke kuwa watumwa we nzambi keli.
Imunu wowose yang'otenda ighomnoghelesa Imulungu na yang'omnoghela ndughu yake, ayo si imwana we Imulungu bae. Apfi pfipfo pfawomanyika iwana we Imulungu na iwana wa Yehile.
Imunu ang'apfikitsa mbuli itsibama lukuli lwake luliheka, ayo kakuwa mwihile we Imulungu, kwaapfila ng'okinda bae mbuli ye Imulungu, na ng'odaha bae kuikinda.
Apfo, ghumoyo ghwangu ghwodeng'elela, lulimi lwangu lolonga kwa kudeng'elela, na lukuli lwangu lutsokala kwa lolelo,
Bae! Chanilonga nene chicho chino, nambiko tse iwanu ing'awammanyile Imulungu wowalapfila pfinyamkela, si Imulungu bae. Na nene sibama bae mwilunge na ipfinyamkela.

Mna awala iwamtoghole Yesu ako Antiyokiya tsakukala na manabii we Imulungu ne iwalangulitsi, nawo tsawakala Balinaba na Simoni iyakemighwe Mtitu na Lukiyo iyolawila Kirene na Sauli na Manaeni iyalelighwe hamwe na Herodi.
Mleke kutoghola munu wowose yawabughe kwa mbuli tsa ubwetsi; mana kwaajili ya pfinu ka apfo maya ye Imulungu yowatsila awala iwolema kumuhulikitsa Imulungu.
Waghomighwe waleke kulonga, kwaapfila wopfulughitsa kaye ngima kwa kulangulitsa ipfinu pfang'awobamighwa kupfilangulitsa, wotenda apfo ili wapate tsisendi.
Yesu tsakalonga si wose bae iwelile kwaapfila tsakamanya imunu iyoghenda kumhunduka.
Yesu kawalongela, “Nowalongela ghendo, imunu wowose ka ng'akwingila bae mne libanda lya wang'olo kubitila halibani, ila kakwingila kwa nzila ingi ayo ka mbapfi na mbokaji.
Waileka inzila iigholoke, wagha na wawinza inzila ya Balaamu, imwana we Beori, iyanoghele maliho ghehile.
Kuya iwanu iwali si Wayahudi na Wayahudi ne iwakulu wawo walamla wawatendele pfihile iwatumighwa awo, na wawatowe ne ghamabwe.

Yesu kamghutsa keli lwa kadatu, “Simoni mwana wa Yohane, kwoninoghela?” Simoni Petiri kona usungu kwaapfila Yesu kamghutsa lwa kadatu, “Apfi kwonoghela?” Kamwidika, “Imtwatsa, kwomanya pfinu pfose, kwomanya ka nokunoghela.” Yesu kamlongela, “Wadime iwang'olo wangu.

Kuduhu chinu chochose mbe ichihile ichitsakwingila mna ghumji agho, wala munu wowose iyotenda pfinu pfa chinyala au iyoghutsuka, ila awala waliheka iwandikighwe mataghwa ghawo mna chitabu cha ughima cha Mwanang'olo.

Na pinga ayo tsakapfala maghwanda gha langi ya tsambalau na madung'u, tsakewamba kwa nzahabu na madini ighong'ala na tsilulu. Naye kakinda chikombe cha nzahabu mmoko mwake, ichimemile ghehile na ughoni wake.
Kubita agha ghose, mwongetse unoghelo, kwaapfila unoghelo wakoha ghose mne umwe iutimile.
Yesu kawedika, “Chipindi chipfika che Imwana we Imunu kutunyighwa!
Ghweghwe yaulonga iwanu waleke ughoni, pfii ghweghwe mwenyegho ng'utenda ughoni bae? Kwoihila pfinyagho pfe imilungu, pfii ghweghwe ng'ukwiba bae mne tsing'anda tse imilungu?
Kwa ndaghitso ayo, nzambi tsaipata uleghelo wa kulamsa chila ukusulukila kwihile ikuli mghati mwangu. Kwaapfila bila ghamalaghitso nzambi ifa.
Nitsokukombola mne iwanu wako na iwanu iwali si Wayahudi ako kwanikutuma,

Kwaapfila aho ghumwande na twetwe tsatukala twawabotsi, ng'atuhulikitse bae, tsatubughighwa, aku twotumikila dong'o na uhondo wose. Tsatukala kwa ukwihila na kwionela chepfu, iwanu tsawatuhila na twetwe tsatuwahila.
Nokulaghitsa hambele he Imulungu na hambele ha Kiristu Yesu, na hambele he wamalaika iwasaghulighwe, uleke kuhigha kwa kusumka, kuya uleke kutenda mbuli yoyose kwa kulola chihanga che imunu.
Lelo mleke kwaghitsa lolelo lyenu, kwaapfila lina ghweko kulu ghendo.
Lelo ichibamighwa awala iweng'ighwe isang'ano wawe iwanu iwotogholighwa.
Petiri kakala ako Yopa matsuwa mengi, tsakakala ne imunu iyotenda tsingotsi yakemighwe Simoni.
Angu ng'ammanyile bae ka mwemwe mwa Ing'anda ye Imulungu, na Ghumuhe ghwe Imulungu kokala mghati mwenu?
Lelo ndughu tsangu, kwa idamu ya Yesu twodaha ghendo kwingila Hanu Haenzeluke Ghendo bila kupfuka.
Yesu kalonga nawo keli, “Nakuka, mtsombama lekeni mtsakufa mne nzambi tsenu. Ng'amdaha bae kutsa hanu hanighenda.”
Kwaapfila mwemwe mwa iwanu we Imulungu, yeye kawanoghela na kawasaghulani muwe wanu wake, lelo mpfale ghumoyo ghwa uluso, unu unoghile, wenyepfale, uhole na ukududumila.
Imunu wowose iyobama kunitumikila yaniwinze, hohose hanikala imtumwa wangu akale baho. Aba wangu katsomtoghola imunu iyonitumikila.
Alongotse ghoya kaye yake na awatende iwanaghe wamuhulikitse bila ukumbetsa.
Lelo mwighume ghumoyo na mwiyapfe, ka pfamtenda sambi.
Ahuno usenga wamuhulike kulawa mwanduso. Twinoghele!
Pfanikona nene, ukughaya kwamghaya sambi, pfinogha mwemwe kukala ka pfamli.
Tsakukala ne imkulu yumwe wa Mafarisayo, imunu we libalatsa lya Wayahudi iyakemighwe Nikodemu.
Pfipfila, Rahabu ayula pinga chiweghe katendighwa kanogha hambele he Imulungu kwa ghamatendo ghake, hala hayawabokele wapelembi na kuwalapfa kunze kwa nzila ingi.
Lekeni iwapinga watsokombolighwa mne ukweleka iwana, ka woghendelela mne inoghola, mne unoghelo na mne uhenzeluka na kukala pfinoghile.
Imulungu we iwanu wano wa Isiraeli tsakawasaghula aba tsetu, kawabaliki iwanu awo hala hawang'ali wahenza mne isi ya Misiri, kuya kwa uwetso wake mkulu kawalapfa mne isi ayo.
Imulungu iyomanya imimoyo ye iwanu kalangusa ka kawatoghola kwa kuweng'a Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka, ka pfayatendile kuna twetwe.
Kwaapfila yuyula iyalongile, “Uleke utsinzi,” pfipfila kalonga, “Uleke kukoma.” Ka ng'utenda bae utsinzi lekeni kwokoma, ghweghwe ng'ukinda bae Ghamalaghitso ghose.
Noweng'a ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose, nawo ng'awatsakufa bae. Kuduhu imunu iyodaha kuwaboka mna ghamoko ghangu.
Imulungu wa tindiwalo, ng'atsokawa bae kumhonda Setani hasi mwe maghulu ghenu. Uluso we Imtwatsa wetu Yesu ukale namwe.
Kwa kunze wakoneka ka iwanu iwompfuka Imulungu, lekeni woilema ngupfu yake. Wibaghule ghendo ne iwanu awo.
Pfipfila twetwe hata ka twawengi, twa lukuli lumwe kwa kwilunga na Kiristu, na chila munu ka chilungo cha miyaghe.
Imbuli ino yolongesa, nokubama ulonge imbuli ino kwe ingupfu, ili awala iwamtoghole Imulungu wakumbuke kukala mne ghamatendo ghanoghile. Agho ghanogha na ghowatenda iwanu wabwede.

Apfo Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka ghatimila, aghala ighalongile, “Abrahamu tsakamtoghola Imulungu, na kwa ukutoghola kwake, Abrahamu koneka kanogha hambele he Imulungu.” Apfo Abrahamu kakemighwa sale we Imulungu.
Ndughu tsangu, ka mwomtoghola Imtwatsa wetu Yesu Kiristu, Imtwatsa wa utunitso, mleke kuwabaghula iwanu.
Mimelo yawo iwa ka tsikabuli itsili mwatsi milimi yawo yolonga ughutsu. Mmilomo mwawo wana tsimbuli tsine sumu ka ya nzoka.
Pfipfila chila mmale yamnoghele mwehe wake ka pfayounoghela lukuli lwake mwenyegho. Imunu iyomnoghela mwehe wake kenoghela imwenyegho.
Lelo tulonge choni? Iwanu iwali si Wayahudi bae, ng'awasang'ane chinu ili woneke ne Imulungu wanogha, tsawoneka ne Imulungu wanogha kwa ukutoghola kwawo,
Wobamighwa waikinde kwa ghumoyo ghunoghile kweli ye inoghola iighubulighwe ne Imulungu.

Iwatumwa wane iwatwatsa Wakiristu waleke kuwabetsa kwaapfila wowona wawo ka Wakiristu weyawo hela. Ila wobamighwa wawasang'anile pfinoghile ghendo, kwaapfila awo iwobweda kulawa mne isang'ano yawo, wana inoghola na wonoghelighwa nawo. Uwalangulitse na uwakanye pfinu pfino.
Ka wamwenga wawo ng'awomtoghola Imulungu bae, pfii chinu acho chitsomtenda Imulungu aleke kutogholighwa?
Asikali yumwe kamuhoma Yesu mlubapfu kwa mghowa, bahala ilawa idamu na ghamatsi.
Alino laghitso lyangu, mwinoghele ka pfaniwanoghele mwemwe.

Mleke kulapfa pfilungo pfe ng'uli tsenu pfitende ghehile, ila mwilapfe iwenyegho kwe Imulungu, ka iwanu imtsihulighwe kulawa mne lifwa, pfilapfeni pfilungo pfenu kwe Imulungu pfisang'ane aghala ighanoghile ka pfayobama Imulungu.
Lekeni twetwe si iwanu wa ukupfukapfuka bae na ukuhinyighwa, ila twetwe twotoghola na twokombolighwa.
Baho Waisiraeli wose watsokombolighwa, ka pfayandikighwe, Mkombotsi katsakutsa kulawa Sayuni, Katsoghalapfa ghehile ghose mna lukolo lwa Yakobu,
iwamkomile Imtwatsa Yesu na manabii, na hata twetwe pfipfila watudununza. Iwanu awo ng'awamnoghelesa Imulungu bae na wowahila iwanu wose.
Kwaapfila tung'aghendelela kutenda nzambi ghiladi aku twomanya ukweli, kuduhu nambiko iidaha kulapfighwa keli kwaajili ya kuleghusa nzambi.
Kwa kwilunga na Yesu Kiristu, Imulungu katutsilihula hamwe naye, tukakale naye kulanga,
Apfo mleke kulonga ughutsu! Chila munu yalongese kwa miyaghe, kwaapfila twetwe wose twa pfilungo pfa lukuli lumwe.
Lekeni ng'atuwatogholele mbe, ili ukweli we Imbuli Inoghile usighale namwe.
Apfo ayula iyolonga kwa lugha ing'atsimanyika, yalombe yadahe kuwafasilila iwanu achila chalongile.
Matsuwa ghagho Sauli tsakaghendelela kuwatenda iwanu iwamtoghole Imtwatsa wapfuke ghendo kwa kulonga katsowakoma. Kaghenda kwa mtambika mkulu,
“Sambi nakutsa kuna ghweghwe, tsanonga ghano ghose haning'ali muisi, ili wameme ndeng'elo yangu mne mimoyo yawo.
Lekeni mdeng'elele kwaapfila tsamghaya ka Kiristu pfayaghayile, ili hautsoghubulighwa utunitso wake mdeng'elele ghendo.
Nilola mghati, mbona iwanyama wane ghamaghulu mane iwali muisi, iwanyama wa kubagho, iwotambala, ne iwapfideghe wa kulanga.
Lekeni sambi mghaleke agha ghose, maya, soyoka no ukutenda ghehile. Mleke ukumligha Imulungu, na malonga ghehile ghaleke kulawa mne imilomo yenu.
na kwaapfila isang'ano yake tsaikala kutenda pfibumbughitsa ka wawo, kakala nawo na kusang'ana nawo.
Apfo nzambi ileke kutawala mne ng'uli tsenu itsikufa, ili mleke kutsiwinza dong'o tsa lukuli.
Kwa taghwa lye Imtwatsa wetu Yesu Kiristu twowalaghitsa na kuwakanya iwanu awo wawe wahole na wasang'ane ili waje ichijo chawo iwenyegho.
“Kwaapfila awala iwabala wetu tsawamwonela chepfu Yosefu, wamhutsa yawe mtumwa mne isi ya Misiri. Lekeni Imulungu tsakakala hamwe naye,
Yumwe wao iyakemighwe Agabo kema, na kwa uwetso wa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka kalonga ka itsolawila inzala ng'ulu muisi mwose. Na inzala ayo ilawila mne ghamatsuwa gha mndewa Kilaudi.
Hayamalitse kulonga agho, katowa ghamaghoti hamwe nawo, kamlomba Imulungu.
Na iwanu wa Kiristu Yesu waghakoma ghamawatso ghawo na soyoka tsawo tsihile itsikalile mghati mwawo.
Ndughu tsangu, hamghetsighwa mna maghayo ghoghose ghala mdeng'elele ghendo,
Tung'alonga twilunga naye aku tung'ali twakwanga mchisi, twoghutsuka na ng'atutenda gha kweli.
Kona kulanga kughubulighwa ne ichinu ka gholole kulu lyohulumsighwa muisi kwa membe tsake nne.
Wamwenga twolawila Paritiya, Midiya na Elamu, wamwenga wolawila Mesopotamiya, Yudeya, Kapadokiya, Ponto na isi ya Asiya,
Twolomba apfi ili mdahe kukala ka Imtwatsa pfayobama, mghendelele kutenda ighomnoghela yeye. Mweleke chila ghamatunda ghanoghile, mkule mne ukummanya Imulungu,
Mwanangu Timoteo, nokulaghitsa laghitso lino, kwa ghamalonga ghe unabii ghaulongelighwe ghumwande ughawinze ili udahe kuhuma pfinoghile ing'ondo ya kuyamila Imbuli Inoghile,
Kuya haghamalile agho nihulika litsi kulu ka lya mtingano mkulu we iwanu kulanga, lyolonga, “Mumtunye Imulungu! Ukombotsi, utunitso na ingupfu pfose pfa Imulungu wetu.
Mwemwe pfipfila ghumwande tsamkala ka mfa kwaajili ya matotso na tsinzambi tsenu.
Ng'amdaha bae kuchinwela ichikombe che Imtwatsa aku mwochinwela chikombe che pfinyamkela. Ng'amdaha ukuja mne metsa ye Imtwatsa na baho mne metsa ya pfinyamkela.
Kwaapfila mwemwe mwa iwanu we Imulungu, mbuli tsa ughoni, au ghoghose ghehile au soyoka tsileke kulongighwa ka tsamghati mwenu.

Kwa iwanu iwelile hambele he Imulungu, chila chinu chela, lekeni kuduhu chochose ichelile kwa awala iwehile na ing'awotoghola Imulungu, na uwetso wawo wo kusaghula kutenda ghanoghile au ghehile kuhinyika na tsimbutsi tsawo tsiha.

Iwanu wose iwamuhulike wakangawala, walonga, “Imunu yuno si yuyula bae iyawakomile iwanu iwamtamanile Yesu akula Yerusalemu? Ambe tsakatsa hano yawaghoghe iwanu awo kuya yawaghale kwe iwatambika wakulu!”

Lekeni sambi Yesu keng'ighwa isang'ano ya ukutambika inoghile kubita yawo, ka pfayali mlamlitsi wa laghano ilinoghile kubita laghano lila, kwaapfila lima mne ipfinu pfinoghile ghendo pfalongile Imulungu.
Kwaapfila kuna nene, ughima kumsang'anila Kiristu na ning'afa nene nobweda.
Nene nomanya ghendo ka Imulungu iyandusile isang'ano ino inoghile mghati mwenu, katsoighendeletsa mbaka haitsotimila mne litsuwa lila hayatsakuya Kiristu Yesu.

Twomanya ka Imwana we Imulungu katsa, na katwing'a tsimbutsi ili tummanye Imulungu wa kweli. Twetwe twokala mghati mwe Imulungu wa kweli na mghati mwe Imwanaghe Yesu Kiristu. Ayuno iyo Imulungu wa kweli na auno iwo ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose.
Mtende pfamdaha mkale tseghamba ne iwanu wose.
Tulikinde ghendo lolelo lyetu lyatulitoghola na kulilonga, kwaapfila Imulungu yekile laghano lyake kotogholighwa.
“Nowalekela iamani, noweng'a iamani yangu. Siweng'a bae ka isi pfaitendagha. Mleke kughanzika. Mleke kupfuka.
Apfo ghamatsuwa ghose twoghumighwa ghumoyo na twomanya ghendo tung'akala mna lukuli luno luliheka, twokala kutali na ukaye yetu kwe Imtwatsa.
Ka imunu kotegheletsa mbuli tsangu na ng'otsikinda bae, sitsomuhigha bae. Kwaapfila sitsile bae kuhigha iisi lekeni nitsa kuikombola.

Mleke kwighala na Kaini, iyalongotsighwe na Yehile, kamkoma mdodo wake Abeli. Ebali yamkomile? Kwaapfila aghala ghang'ali yotenda tsagheha, na aghala gha mdodo wake tsaghang'ali ghomnoghelesa Imulungu.
Pfisiwa pfose tsapfihupa na pfidunda pfose pfihinyighwa.
Apfo kubitila imunu yumwe Abrahamu iyakalile ka kafa, tsawelekighwa iwanu wengi ing'awodahika bae kupetighwa, ka tsinondo tsa kulanga na msanga ghwa kumwani.
Lelo Imndewa wa ghamatsuwa ghose, yang'akufa, yang'akoneka, Imulungu yaliheka, yeye apfukighwe na atunyighwe ghamatsuwa ghose. Ona.
Naye kalonga kwa kukemelela, “Mpfukeni Imulungu, mtunyeni yeye! Kwaapfila saa yake yo ukuhigha ipfika. Mtamanileni yeye iyalumbile kulanga na iisi, ibahali na mbwibwi tse ghamatsi.”

Hambele, iwanu iwamtoghole Yesu hawang'ali wakongetseka, tsakulawila manung'uniko mghati mwe iwomtoghola Yesu iwolonga Chigiriki, na awala iwolonga Chihebulaniya. Awala iwolonga Chigiriki tsawanung'unika ka iwasaka wawo wang'ali wosemighwa mne ukugholelighwa ipfijo pfa chila litsuwa.
Agho ghagho ghamkemelighwe, kwaapfila Kiristu tsakawadununzikilani mwemwe, kamlekeleni ghumfano, apfo mtende ka pfatendile yeye.
Hatung'ali hamwe na mwemwe tsatuwalongela, “Imunu iyolema kusang'ana, na aleke ukuja.”
Kwaapfila Imulungu tsakainoghela isi yose mbaka kamlapfa Imwanaghe nyalimwe, ili chila imunu iyomtoghola aleke kwagha ila yawe na ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose.
Lekeni ichinyamkela kawalongela, “Yesu nommanya, Pauli nommanya, lekeni mwemwe tsina nani?”
Kuya nimwona imnyama yula mkulu ne iwandewa we iisi ne asikali wawo wetingana hamwe ili wetowe na ayula iyadinile falasi mtselu na asikali wake.
Tudina mne imeli iilawile Adiramito iibamile kuka kubitila mne mwani tsa isi ye Asiya, kuya tuka. Aristariko imunu wa Makedoniya iyolawila Tesalonike tsakakala mmeli na twetwe.
Mleke kuwasemwa awala iwali mchifungo ka mwemwe mwohighwa hamwe nawo. Muwakumbuke awala iwodununzika ka namwe mwodununzika nawo.
Na chochose chamtenda au chamlonga, chobamighwa chitendighwe kwa taghwa lya Imtwatsa Yesu, mumlongele mighede Aba Imulungu kubitila yeye.
Chila munu iyolangulisighwa mbuli ye Imulungu na yamgholele imlangulitsi wake ghala ighanoghile.
Imulungu ng'amwing'ile bae hata hanu hadoghodogho he isi ino hawe hanu hake, hata apfo tsakamlongela katsomwing'a isi ino iwe yake na iwe ye iwanaghe, hata ka matsuwa agho ng'akalile ne imwana bae.
Tsakawatendela iwanu wetu pfihile, na kawonela iwabala wetu kwa kuwalaghitsa wawase kunze iwana wawo pfing'ele wafe.
Kuya Petiri ne imwanang'ina yungi waghenda mmango.
Apfo ghamatsuwa ghose nekatsa niwe na ghumoyo ghunoghile kwe Imulungu na kwe iwanu.
Iwanu awo weghala na ghamawimbi makulu gha ibahali, na ghamatendo ghawo ghe chinyala gholawa ka lihopfu. Iwanu awo ka tsinondo itsikwangakwanga itsikilighwe chisi cha ghamatsuwa ghose.
Kuya nene siibokele kulawa kwe imunu wowose, wala silangulitsighwe ne imunu bae. Yesu Kiristu imwenyegho iyo yanighubulile.
Hatung'ali twokala kuno twolongotsighwa na lukuli, dong'o tsa lukuli tsatsisongesighwa ne ghamalaghitso, tsisang'ana mne ng'uli tsetu, na ghose ghatutendile ghamalila mne lifwa.
Na kwa chinu acho nisaghulighwa niwe mtumighwa na niwapetele iwanu imbuli inoghile na niwe mlangulitsi mne inoghola na mne ukweli kwe iwanu si Wayahudi bae. Nolongesa, sighutsuka bae!

Iwanu wala iwoghakinda ghamalaghitso gha Imulungu wokala mghati mwe Imulungu, na Imulungu kokala mghati mwawo. Apfo kwa Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka ghwatwing'ighwe ne Imulungu, twetwe twomanya ka Imulungu kokala mghati mwetu.
Imunu wowose mna mwemwe aleke kwibamila yaliyeka ghanoghile, ila yawabamile na weyaghe.
Mkale pfinoghile chila imunu na miyaghe. Mleke kwighoda, ila mtoghole kukala ne iwanu mbughilambughila. Mleke kwibona mna ihekima ng'ani.
Lelo mleke kuwa ne fondogholo, mleke kuwehila wanu wangi na mleke kuwa na maya na kwidamilila ne maligho. Ghehile ghose mghaleke!
Na nene nendighwa na Imulungu niwe mtumwa we iwanu iwomtoghola Kiristu. Ning'ighwa sang'ano ya kuwalongela imbuli yake pfinoghile ghendo,
Mvili tsake tsoneka nzelu chwee ka sufi, na nenge tsake ka lambi lya ghumoto,
Kwaapfila agha ghose ghatendeka kwaajili ya mwemwe, ili uluso we Imulungu hauwapfikila iwanu wengi ng'ani, utsowatenda iwanu walonge mighede na ukumtunya Imulungu kwongetseke.
Imunu wowose iyoluja lukuli lwangu na kunwa idamu yangu, ayo kokala mghati mwangu, na nene nokala mghati mwake.
Marita kamwidika, “Ona, Mtwatsa! Nokutoghola ghweghwe kwa Kiristu, Imwana wa Imulungu, iyatsile mne isi.”
Awo wose waghendelela kulangulitsighwa ne iwatumighwa wa Yesu, wakala hamwe ka iwandughu, wamegha ichighate na walomba hamwe.
Ghweghwe konoghela ghamatendo ighomnoghela Imulungu na koghahila ghehile. Apfo Imulungu, Imulungu wako kakusaghula, kakutenda udeng'elele ng'ani kubita pfawatendile weyagho.”
Kamkoma kwa limaghe Jakobu ndughu yake Yohane.
Ukale kutali ne mbuli itsihile na tsa chibotsi, atso tsowatenda iwanu wakale kutali ne Imulungu.
Imunu wowose iyomhila ndughu yake, ayo mkoma wanu, namwe mwomanya mkoma wanu kahela ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose iukala mghati mwake.

Hawamalitse ukuja, Yesu kamghutsa Simoni Petiri, “Simoni imwana wa Yohane, apfi kwoninoghela kubita wano?” Simoni Petiri kamwidika, “Ona, Imtwatsa ghweghwe kwomanya ka nene nokunoghela.” Yesu kamlongela, “Wadime iwanang'olo wangu.”
Ghumuhe komwing'a imunu yumwe mbuli tsa nzewele, Ghumuhe yuyo komwing'a imunu yungi uwetso we ukumanya pfinu.
Mne ghumwanza ghwa kabili, Yosefu tsakawalongela ndughu tsake yeye tsakakala nani, na mndewa wa Misiri kawamanya iwandughu wa Yosefu.
Kwaapfila ka Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka pfogholonga, “Imunu wowose iyonoghela ughima na kwona ghamatsuwa ghanoghile, mlomo wake uleke kulonga ghehile na lulimi lwake luleke kulonga ughutsu.
Iwanu wose iwatoghole tsawakala na ghumoyo ghumwe na tsawalangula chinu chimwe. Kuduhu imunu wowose iyalongile ka ichinu iyalinacho chake aliyeka, ila wegholela ipfinu pfose pfawakalile napfo.
Niwagholela aghala ghanibokele nene mwenyegho, Kiristu tsakafa kwa nzambi tsetu ka pfagholonga Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka,
Ghumji ghwa Babeli tsaghuhighighwa kwa totso lya kuwakoma manabii na iwanu we Imulungu na iwanu wose iwachinjighwe muisi mwose.
Iwanu iwali si Wayahudi bae hawahulike apfo, wadeng'elela na waitunya imbuli ye Imtwatsa, na wose iwasaghulighwe kwa ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose watoghola.
Ayula yolapfa ukalangama mna mbuli tsino, kolonga, “Ona, nakutsa sambi.” Amina. Utse Imtwatsa Yesu!
Mtende aghala ghamwilangulitse na kughabokela kulawa kuna nene, ghose ghamuhulike na kughona kuna nene, na Imulungu iyotenda iwanu wakale tseghamba katsokuwa namwe.
Lekeni mleke kumtendela ka mwomwihila, ila mumkanye ka miyenu.

Mwalangitse imunu aleke kuwatenda watumwa kwa ghamalangulitso gha hela, gha ughutsu uliyeka, ighahuwila mabokelo ghe iwanu ne ipfinyamkela iwotawala, na wala si aghala igholawa kwa Kiristu imwenyegho bae!
notsuma mvike hanibama kupfika ili nibokele ghweko lya ughima wa matsuwa ghose, ghweko lyang'emele Imulungu kubitila Yesu Kiristu.
Yeye tsakelapfa imwenyegho kwaajili yetu ili atughombole kulawa mne ghehile ghose na kututenda tuwe iwanu wahenzeluke iwali wake yeye mwenyegho, iwanu iwosulukila kutenda ghanoghile.
“Nowalongela ghendo, imunu wowose iyohulika mbuli yangu na kumtoghola ayula iyanitumile kana ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose, ng'atsohighighwa kwaapfila kaloka lifwa kengila mne ughima.
Malaika iyalongile na nene tsakana lubiki lwa nzahabu lwa kulingila ghumji agho na imibani yake na ubanda wake.
Watsomalila kutsimu, mulungu wawo iyo soyoka tsawo tse lukuli, weghodela pfinu pfawo pfe chinyala, wepfikitsa ipfinu pfe isi pfiliyeka.
Kuya aleke kuwa mkiristu wa sambisambi, hela katseghoda na ukuhighighwa ka pfahighighwe Yehile

Sale tsangu, nitenda ka pfanidahile kumwandikileni mwemwe mbuli tsa ukombotsi watuhangila, tsambona ghoya kumwandikileni na kuwaghumani mimoyo kwaajili ya ukwamila ukutoghola kwaweng'ighwe iwanu we Imulungu mala lumwe kwa matsuwa ghose.
Tsawona maya ng'ani kwaapfila iwatumighwa awo wang'ali wolangulitsa iwanu ka Yesu katsilihuka, ichinu ichikonesa ghendo ka iwanu iwafile watsotsilihuka.
Kwaapfila nzambi tsake tsilundika mbaka tsipfika kulanga, Na Imulungu kaghakumbuka ghehile ghake.
Kuya Yesu kengila keli mne ghumji ghwa Kana ako Galilaya, hanu haghaluse ghamatsi kuwa idipfai. Baho tsakukala ne chilongotsi yane imwana iyoghula ako Kaperinaumu.
Mleke kuleghela hamumsang'anila Imtwatsa, msang'anileni kwa ghumoyo wenu wose.
Hata ka ng'ammwonile bae, mwomnoghela, na hata ka sambi ng'ammwona, mwemwe mwomtoghola na mmemesighwa ndeng'elo ya utunitso ing'aidaha bae kulongighwa,
Apfi pfipfo pfatumanya ka twokala mghati mwe Imulungu naye kokala mghati mwetu, kwaapfila katwing'a Ghumuhe wake.
Hanu hala tsahakala na siki, apfo wapfabika lidodoki mne siki, walika mne lubiki lwa msopo, wamwikila mumlomo.
Naye katukombola kulawa mne ingupfu ya chisi, katughala mne undewa we Imwanaghe iyomnoghela,
Ndughu tsangu, nowalombani mwalangitse na awala iwowatenda iwanu webaghule, na kuwatenda iwanu wangi waleke kughakinda malangulitso ghambokele. Mkale kutali nawo,
Imunu iyeng'ighwe ukuwasang'anila weyaghe, leka yawasang'anile, ka ukulangulitsa leka yalangulitse.
“Mne litsuwa lila ng'amtsonilomba chinu chochose. Nowalongela ghendo, Aba wangu katsomwing'ani chinu chochose chamlomba kwa taghwa lyangu.

Ghumsingi ghwa ubanda wa ghumji aghwo tsaghuwambighwa kwa chila libwe lya bei ng'ulu. Libwe lya mwanduso lya ghumsingi tsalikemighwa yasipi, na lya keli safaya, lya kadatu kalkedoni na lya kane sumalidi,
Apfo imunu iyomanya ghanoghile na ng'oghatenda bae, ayo kotenda nzambi.
Baho kulawila litsi hane chighoda che undewa, lilonga, “Mtunyeni Imulungu wetu, mwe iwatumwa wake wose, mwemwe imumpfuka, wadodo kwe iwakulu.”
Kwaapfila sambi twoghutilila, aku twololela kwa kusulukila ghendo ukupata lukuli lwa kulanga,
Lekeni chila imunu alole choyotenda imwenyegho. Ka chinogha, kodaha kwighodela mghati mwake bila kulola choyotenda imunu yungi.

Imunu ang'ona ng'otenda pfinoghile bae kuleka kumkwela mwali yamlapfile tsengele, na ka ng'odaha bae kukala bila kukwela, na ang'ona mwali wake miyaka yake yofosa, yatende pfayobama, ang'amkwela pinga ayo, ng'otenda nzambi bae.
Iwanu watsowawinga mne Ing'anda ya Ukulombela, na chipindi chakutsa chila yatsowakoma katsopfikitsa komlapfila Imulungu inambiko.
Haning'ali nolola, mbona chitango chingi chikulu ichikangawatsa ako kulanga. Tsakukala na malaika saba na majanga saba gha utsighilo, kwapfila kubitila agho imaya ye Imulungu itimila.
Yesu kamwidika, “Ka nilonga ichinu chihile, uchilonge hambele he iwanu. Lekeni ka nongesa, ule kwonitowa?”

Naghwe pfipfila sale yangu, uwapfile wapinga awo, kwaapfila tsawasang'ana na nene kuyenetsa Imbuli Inoghile, hamwe na Kilementi na awala wose iwasang'ane na nene, iwandikighwe ghamataghwa ghawo mne ichitabu che ughima.
Kwaapfila tsawamwagha idamu ye iwanu wako na manabii wako, naghwe kuweng'a idamu yanwe, acho chicho chawabamighwe wabokele.”
Mbe! Twetwe tufa mne nzambi, lelo tudahatse kukala keli mne nzambi?
Imnyama yula mkali iyakalile baho, na sambi ng'ali baha, ayo ka mndewa wa nane, yeye ka yumwe we awala saba, naye katsohinyighwa ghendo.
Lekeni Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka ghalongatse? Gholonga, “Muwinge ipinga mtumwa ne imwanaghe, kwaapfila imwana we imtumwa ng'atsohala bae ne imwana we ipinga iyali si mtumwa.”
Lekeni awala iwobama kuwa na tsimali watsakughwila mne ghamaghetso na mne chonzo cha usulukilo wa chibotsi, nawo wowaghala mna ukuhinyika na ukukomighwa.
Imnyama mkali na membe tsila kumi tsawonile, tsitsomuhila chiweghe ayo. Tsitsomboka chila chinu chayali nacho na kumleka chidako, tsitsomja lukuli lwake na kumlakatsa kwa ghumoto.
Lekeni imunu iyomnoghela Imulungu komanyika na Imulungu.
Tulonge choni lelo? Twetwe Wayahudi tunogha kubita iwanu wangi? Mbe! Ka pfaniwalongele aho mwanduso ka Wayahudi na iwanu wangi wose wana nzambi.
Baho watenda ichinyagho che imwana wa ng'ombe, wachilapfila nambiko na kuchitendela ichihungo ichinu chawatendile kwa ghamoko ghawo wenyegho.

Iwanu iwasighale awala ing'awakomighwe bae kwa majanga agho madatu, ng'awalekile aghala ghehile ghawatendile kwa ghamoko ghawo wenyegho, ng'awalekile bae kupfitamanila pfinyamkela, pfinyagho pfe nzahabu na pfa fesa na pfa shaba na pfa ghamabwe na pfa mibiki, pfinu ing'apfidaha bae ukwona, ukuhulika wala ukughenda.
Kwaapfila twomanya kumpfuka Imtwatsa chinu chachi, apfo twotenda ka pfatudaha wakwegha iwanu. Imulungu kotumanya pfinoghile, nani nololela mwemwe pfipfila mwotumanya pfinoghile mne imimoyo yenu.

Twetwe twose tsatukala ka wawo, tsatutsiwinza soyoka tsihile itsili mghati mwetu, tutenda ghoghose ka ng'uli tsetu ne mbutsi tsetu pfatsibamile. Twetwe pfipfila tsatwighala nawo, kwaapfi pfatuli tsatubamighwa tuhighighwe ne Imulungu ka iwanu wangi.
Kwa mbuli nyingi Petiri kawakomangitsa iwanu, kalonga, “Mwikombole kulawa mweleko ghuno ghuhile.”
Kwaapfila mng'akala ka ng'uli pfatsibama, mtsakufa ghendo. Lekeni ka kubitila Ghumuhe mwoghakoma aghala ghehile ighatendighwe na lukuli, mtsokala waghima.
Ka Ghamaandiko Mahenzeluka pfagholonga, “Imunu wowose iyomtoghola ng'atsoghelighwa chinyala bae.”
Tanu nonge mighede kwe Imulungu wangu kubitila Yesu Kiristu kwaajili ya mwemwe mwose, kwaapfila ukutoghola kwenu kopetighwa muisi mwose.
Ndughu tsetu, mwemwe imnoghelighwe ne Imulungu, twomanya ka msaghulighwa naye,
Kubita ghose, mwinoghele ng'ani mwemwe kwa mwemwe, kwaapfila unoghelo ughubikagha nzambi nyingi.
Hailamlighwe tughende Italiya, Pauli na iwohighwa wangi wekighwa mne ghamoko gha imkulu yumwe wa asikali iyakemighwe Juliasi, wa chikosi ichikemighwe cha Agusti.

wemba wila wa Musa, mtumwa we Imulungu, na wila wa Mwanang'olo, walonga “Ghwe Imtwatsa Imulungu Yune Ngupfu, ghutendile makulu na ighokangawatsa Ghweghwe Mndewa wa tsiisi tsose, nzila tsako tsa haki na tsa kweli.
Mwighale ne iwana wadowado, iwelekighwe sambi pfawosulukila kong'a ghamatombo, namwe msulukile matombo ghanoghile igholawa mne Imbuli ye Imulungu, ili mkule na ukukombolighwa,

Kuya nihulika litsi kulawa kulanga lyolonga, “Wandike pfino, Wabweda awala iwakufa sambi na kughendelela aku welunga ne Imtwatsa.” Naye Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka kolonga, “Amina, watsobwihila kulawa mne sang'ano tsawo, kwaapfila ghawatendile ghatsowawinza.”
Dini inoghile na ilihela totso hachinga ha Aba wetu Imulungu, iyo ino ano, kuwapfila iwachuwa ne pfitsuka mne maghayo ghawo, na kukala kutali na ghehile ighali muisi.
Nowalongelani apfi ili imunu wowose aleke kuwaghutsukilani kwa mbuli tse ughutsu, hata ka tsakoneka tsinogha ng'ani.

Kuya nihulika chila chilumbe kulanga na muisi, hasi mwe iisi na mne ibahali; pfilumbe pfose ipfili mumo, nipfihulika pfolonga, “Yeye iyokala mne chighoda che undewa na Mwanang'olo, yatunyighwe, yaheshimighwe, yatunitsighwe na yawe na ngupfu ghamatsuwa ghose na ghamatsuwa ghose!”
Kuya malaika wa kabili katowa malati yake, baho chinu ichoneke ka chidunda chikulu chasighwa mwibahali, na fungu limwe lye mafungu madatu gha ibahali liwa damu,
wamlapfa kunze mwe ghumji wandusa kumtowa na ghamabwe. Iwakalangama tsaweka ghamaghwanda ghawo mne ghamaghulu ghe imsongolo yumwe iyakemighwe Sauli aghalolese.
Kuya Ghamaandiko gholonga, “Mumtunye Imtwatsa, mwemwe iwanu imli si Wayahudi bae, Mumtunye yeye, mwemwe makabila ghose!”
Kwaapfila pfinu pfose pfolawa kuna yeye, na pfabaha kubitila yeye na kwaajili ya yeye. Imulungu yatunitsighwe ghamatsuwa ghose. Ona.
Litsuwa lya keli Yohane kamwona Yesu komtsila, kalonga, “Mlole! Imwana Ing'olo we Imulungu iyosola nzambi tse isi yose!
Kwa kumtoghola Imulungu Rahabu, pinga chiweghe ng'akomighwe bae na awala yang'awamuhulikitse Imulungu, kwaapfila tsakawabokela pfinoghile wapelembi wa Waisraeli.
Wabapfi wakutsa kwiba, kukoma na kuhinya, nene nitsa wawe ne ughima bwelele, na watsokala ghamatsuwa ghose.
Lekeni twetwe twa wenyekaye wa kulanga, kulawa ako twomlolela Mkombotsi wetu kwa kusulukila, Imtwatsa Yesu Kiristu yatse.
Apfo mwibokele mwemwe kwa mwemwe, ka Kiristu pfayambokeleni mwemwe, ili Imulungu yatunyighwe.

Uwasole iwanu wano, wideghetese nawo, uwalihile sendi, ili waghetighwe mvili tsawo. Kuya chila imunu katsomanya ka mbuli tsako tsawahulike ng'atsilongesa bae, ila ghweghwe imwenyegho koghawinza ghamalaghitso gha Musa.

Pfipfila Abrahamu ka aba wa awala iwengile ngoma, lekeni si kwa kwingila ngoma kuliheka bae, ila kwaapfila woiwinza nzila ila ya ukutoghola yakalile nayo aba wetu Abrahamu yaiwinzile ahala ng'ana yengile ngoma.
Kuya watowa simbi, na simbi imghwila Matiasi, naye kongetsighwa mne iwatumighwa wala kumi na yumwe.
“Wabweda awala iwaleghusighwe matotso ghawo, na nzambi tsawo itsileghusighwe.
Wakalangama awo weli iwo mibiki mili ye mitseituni na pfitasa pfili ipfikwima hambele he Imtwatsa we iisi.
Mlile, mwiyayane na kwona usungu. Chiseko chenu chiwe chililo, na ukudeng'elela kwenu kuwe usungu.
Sale yangu, uleke kuwinza ghehile, ila ughawinze ghanoghile. Imunu wowose iyotenda ghanoghile kolawa kwe Imulungu. Na imunu wowose iyotenda ghehile ng'amwonile bae Imulungu.

Abrahamu tsakengila ngoma hambele, na kwingila ngoma kwake tsakukala chitango cha ukulangusa ka Imulungu kamtenda kana haki kwaajili ya ukutoghola kwake hala ng'ana yengile ngoma. Apfo Abrahamu kawa aba we iwanu iwomtoghola Imulungu hata ka ng'awengile ngoma bae ili Imulungu yawapete wana haki.
Kwaapfila hatukufa mne nzambi, twokombolighwa kulawa mne nzambi.
Matsuwa ghose twosola lifwa lya Yesu mlukuli mwetu, ili ughima wa Yesu pfipfila woneka mne ng'uli tsetu.
Kwaapfila iwanu wangi wose wolola mbuli tsawo iwenyegho, ng'awolola mbuli tsa Yesu Kiristu bae.
Kwa kumtoghola Imulungu Abrahamu tsakawa aba hata ka tsakalala ng'ani, na Sara tsaang'ali ng'akweleka bae. Abrahamu tsakamtoghola Imulungu ka katsotimitsa laghano lyake.
Ayula iyanitumile kobama apfi, ndeke kumwaghitsa imunu wowose mna iwanu wala iyangaile, ila niwatsilihule wose mna litsuwa lya usighilo.

lekeni kuna twetwe Imulungu ka yumwe; Aba, yalumbile pfinu pfose, kubitila yeye twetwe twa waghima. Kuya tuna Imtwatsa yumwe, iyo Yesu Kiristu, kubitila yeye pfinu pfose tsapfilumbighwa, na twetwe twa waghima kubitila yeye.
Sambi Timoteo koya, naye katulongela mbuli itsinoghile tse inoghola na unoghelo wenu. Katulongela ka mwotukumbuka ghamatsuwa ghose, na mwobama kutwona ka twetwe pfatubama kuwoneni.
Naye Imdimi Imkulu hayatsolawila, mtsobokela ghweko lya utunitso ing'alikwaghitsa bae ukunogha kwake.
Kwaapfila tuna lolelo alyo, twolonga bila kupfuka.
Lekeni iwanu wano woghaligha aghala ghang'awoghamanya. Weghala ne iwanyama wa kumuhulo, wakwelekighwa ili waghoghighwe na wakomighwe. Nawo watsohinyighwa ka iwanyama we kumuhulo,
Yuda tsakalonga pfino, si kwakuwonela libatsi iwahingwa, ila kalonga pfino kwaapfila tsakakala mbapfi, yeye yang'ali yokindagha ghumkoba ghwo ukwikila tsisendi na yang'ali yakwibagha tsisendi.
Na twetwe pfipfila twomanya na twotoghola unoghelo yalinawo Imulungu kuna twetwe. Imulungu iyo unoghelo. Imunu wowose iyokala mne unoghelo kokala mghati mwe Imulungu, na Imulungu kokala mghati mwake.
Kwa maghayo ighalawile Stefani hayakomighwe, iwanu iwamtoghole Yesu tsawapwililika. Wangi waghenda mbaka Foinike, Kupulo na Antiyokiya wapeta imbuli ila kwa Wayahudi waliyeka.
Lekeni ukutenda ighomnoghela Imulungu no ukwenela, apfo pfipfo ipfinu ipfitwapfila ghendo.
Naye tsakeng'ighwa ingupfu ye kwitowa ne iwanu we Imulungu na kuwahuma. Keng'ighwa uwetso kwa chila kabila, chila isi, chila lugha na lukolo.
Angu mtsopata choni kwa kududumila ukutowighwa kwa matotso ghamtenda? Lekeni ka mwoghanzika kwa kutenda ghanoghile na mwodudumila, Imulungu katsombalikini.

Apfo Kiristu iyo mlamlitsi wa laghano lya sambi, ili awala iwakemighwe wabokele laghano lya ukuhala kwa ghamatsuwa ghose. Kwaapfila yeye tsakafa ili yawaghombole iwanu kulawa mne nzambi tsawatendile mne laghano lila lya ghumwande.
Lelo tulonge choni? Apfi tughendelele kukala mnzambi ili uluso we Imulungu wongetseke?
Kuya mleke kulonga mbuli tsa chinyala au mbuli tsa ubwetsi au tsa utani wihile, agho ghose ng'aghanoghile bae kuna mwemwe; ng'apfu mlonge mbuli tsa kumlongela mighede Imulungu.

Tsandola, na nimwona falasi yane langi ka ya lipfu, na ayula iyamdinile tsakakemighwa Lifwa, na Kutsimu tsaimuwinza kuchughu. Nawo tsaweng'ighwa ngupfu mne ilobo imwe ye iisi, kukoma kwa limaghe, kwa nzala, kwa utamu na kwa iwanyama wakali wa kumuhulo.

Apfo, laghano lyehuwila ukutoghola, ili laghano lila lyoneke ghweko lye Imulungu kwa kolo tsose tsa Abrahamu, si kwa awala iwoghakinda Ghamalaghitso waliyeka, ila pfipfila kwa awala iwotoghola ka pfayatendile Abrahamu, iyali aba wetu wose.
Waroma hawamalitse kunighutsa wabama wandekelele, kwaapfila nahela totso ilinitenda nikomighwe
Apfo, ghose ghouhila libatsi lye Imulungu na si choyobama imunu bae au choyosang'ana imunu.
Mleke kutenda uweghe, ka iwanu wangi pfawatendile, kwa litsuwa limwe iwanu elufu ishilini na wadatu tsawafa.
Lekeni nakona mbuli ingi iisang'ana mlukuli mwangu. Mbuli ayo yesonga na mbuli iitogholighwa ne mbutsi tsangu. Mbuli ayo yonenda niwe mtumwa wa mbuli tsa nzambi itsisang'ana mlukuli mwangu.

Lelo tugheke hambali ghamalangulitso gha mwanduso gha mbuli tsa Kiristu, tughende hambele kwa ghamalangulitso ighakomale. Si kughendelela kwika keli ghumsingi ghwa kuleka ghamatendo ghalihela sang'ano, na ghwa kumtoghola Imulungu,
Apfo imunu wowose yaleke kumbetsa, ila mwapfileni yaghendelele tseghamba na ghumwanza wake ili yadahe kumbuyila. Mana nomlolela yoye ne iwanu wangi.
Wandughu tsangu, apfi pfinogha imunu kulonga komtoghola Yesu aku ghamatendo ghake ng'agholangusa apfo? Apfi ukutoghola ako kodahatse kumkombola?
Iwanu wangi wa Yerusalemu wandusa kwighutsa, “Apfi si imunu yuno bae iwombama wamkome?
Kuya kawahumulila, kawalongela, “Bokeleni Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka.
Kwaapfila ng'awamanyile bae Imulungu pfayowatenda iwanu wanogha hambele hake, nawo wandusa inzila yawo iwenyegho, ng'awoiwinza bae inzila ye Imulungu ya kuwatenda iwanu wanogha hambele hake.

Imunu wowose iyomtoghola Imwana we Imulungu kana ukalangama uno mne ghumoyo ghwake. Lekeni imunu wowose ing'ayomtoghola Imulungu, ayo komtenda Imulungu yawe mghutsu, kwaapfila ng'autoghole ukalangama iyaulapfile Imulungu kwa mbuli ye Imwanaghe.
Nowalongela ghendo, imunu iyonitoghola nene katsotenda apfila pfanendile, katsotenda ipfinu pfikulu kubita pfino, kwaapfila nene noghenda kwa Aba wangu.
Iwatumwa wawahulikitse iwatwatsa wawo na kuwanoghelesa mne ipfinu pfose. Waleke ukwihisanya nawo,
Mwalangitse ghendo, imunu wowose aleke kuhungukiwa na uluso we Imulungu, aleke kuwa ka sina lya usungu ilitula na kuwaghalila maghayo iwanu wengi.
Kobamighwa aghwe imunu iyanoghile kwe iwanu iwali kunze mwe kingili lye iwanu we Imulungu ili aleke kughwila mchinyala na mne mtegho wa Yehile.
Chila miyetu yumwe kabokela nzawadi ka Kiristu pfamwing'ile.
Malaika wa keli kakutula ibakuli yake mwibahali. Nayo ibahali ighaluka iwa ka idamu ye imunu iyafile, na pfilumbe pfose pfine ughima ipfili mwibahali tsapfifa.
Mleke kutenda apfo ahala hawamlolani haliheka kwaapfila mwobama mwoneke mnogha, ila msang'ane kwa mimoyo yenu yose ka pfobama Imulungu, kwaapfila mwemwe mwa watumwa wa Kiristu.
bila mimoyo yenu kuwalongela ka mtotsa, ili hamlighighwa, iwanu wala iwalongile ghehile kwa ghamatendo ghenu ighanoghile mne ukwilunga na Kiristu, wone chinyala.
Kwaapfila Aba wangu kobama chila imunu iyomlola Imwana na kumtoghola yawe na ughima wa ghamatsuwa ghose. Nitsomtsilihula litsuwa lya usighilo.”
Bahala malaika we Imtwatsa kamghwisa hasi Herodi, kwaapfila ng'amwing'ile bae Imulungu utunitso, kakindighwa na sango, kafa.
Yatunyighwe Imulungu, Aba wa Imtwatsa wetu Yesu Kiristu, Aba wa libatsi na Imulungu iyokanza ghendo.
Iwanu wangi wagha kulawa mna ghano na wahundukila midawalo ya ubotsi.
Siyonela chinyala bae Imbuli Inoghile, kwaapfila ina ngupfu ye Imulungu ya kumkombola chila munu iyoitoghola, tanu kwe Wayahudi, kuya kwe iwanu iwali si Wayahudi bae.
Kuduhu imunu yungi iyodaha kwika lukwalambatsa lungi kubita yalwikighwe, iyo Yesu Kiristu.
Lekeni chila mmale yamnoghele mwehe wake ka pfayenoghela mwenyegho, naye mwehe yamuhulikitse mmale wake.

Namwe tsamkala mfa kwaajili ya nzambi tsenu, na kwaapfila unu wenu wa nzambi tsang'auleghusighwe bae. Lekeni sambi Imulungu kawatenda mwemwe muwe wa ghima hamwe na Kiristu. Imulungu katuleghusila nzambi tsetu tsose,
Uleke kuleka kutumila gholelo lya Muhe Mwenzeluka ilili mghati mwako, lwing'ighwe kubitila unabii na ahala iwabala hawakwikile ghamoko.
Kuya mbona kulanga kwa sambi na isi ya sambi. Kulanga kula kwa mwanduso na isi ila ya mwanduso tsaihupa, na tsakukala kuduhu keli ibahali.
Mdeng'elele ghamatsuwa ghose,
Matsuwa agho iwanu watsobama lifwa lekeni ng'awatsolyona bae, watsobama wafe, lekeni lifwa litsokala kutali nawo.
Twetwe twotoghola Yesu kafa na katsilihuka keli na twotoghola ka Imulungu katsowaghala hamwe na Yesu kuna yeye awala iwafile aku womtoghola Yesu.
Imunu wowose iyolonga kwa ukutoghola ka Yesu ka Imwana we Imulungu, Imulungu kokala mghati mwake, naye kokala mghati mwe Imulungu.
Tsamlangulitsighwa mghaleke aghala ghehile ghamtendile ghumwande ka imunu pfayotsula lighwanda, ghamatendo ghala ghakalile ghohinyighwa na tsitamaa tsake tsa ughutsu.
Nene nalibani. Imunu wowose iyakwingila kubitila nene katsokombolighwa. Katsakwingila na kulawa, naye katsopata ipfijo.

Tsawafa kwa kutowighwa na ghamabwe, tsawaghanighwa kwa msumeno pfihande pfili, wakomighwa kwa imimaghe, tsawanga kuno na kuno aku wapfala ngotsi tse iwang'olo ne iwamene. Tsawakala wahingwa, wadununzighwa na watendelighwa ghehile.
Mwomanya ka Yesu komnoghelesa Imulungu, lelo mmanye pfipfila ka chila imunu iyotenda ighomnoghelesa Imulungu, ayo kawa imwana we Imulungu.
Kwaapfila Imtwatsa tsakatulaghitsa apfi, ‘Nikwika uwe ghumwanga kwe iwanu iwali si Wayahudi bae, uwaghalile ukombotsi mbaka utsighilo we isi.’ ”

Lekeni tupfileka pfinu pfose pfa chinyala na pfa chinyelenyele. Ng'atukala bae kwa ukubugha na ng'atughela ughutsu bae mne mbuli ye Imulungu, ila kwa kuulangusa ukweli, tweika hasi mwe malamutsi ghe mimoyo ye iwanu hambele he Imulungu.

Naye Yesu henulighwe na kwikighwa lubali lwa kujilo lwe Imulungu, kabokela Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka kulawa kwa Aba wake ka pfayatulongele. Kuya katughalila Ghumuhe ayo, na acho chicho chamchona sambi na kuchihulika.
muupfala unu wa sambi. Unu awu woghendelela kutendighwa ghoya ne Imulungu iyaulumbile ili mwighale naye.
Yesu hayahulike apfi, kalonga, “Utamu uno ng'autsomkoma bae Lazali, utamu uno ulawila kwa utunitso we Imulungu ili Imwana we Imulungu yatunitsighwe kubitila utamu uno.”

Mana Imbuli Inoghile yolangusa mwatsi Imulungu pfayowatenda iwanu wanoghe kuna yeye kwa ukutoghola, kulawa mwanduso mbaka utsighilo. Ka pfayandikighwe mne Ghamaandiko Maenzeluka; “Imunu iyanoghile kwe Imulungu katsokala kwa ukutoghola.”
Naye kalawa aku kaughala msalaba wake, kughenda hanu hakemighwe Bombwe lya Litwi. Kwa Chihebulaniya hokemighwa Goligota.
Mana chila imunu kana gholelo lyake kwa uluso watwing'ile Imulungu. Imunu ka keng'ighwa gholelo lye ukulonga usenga we Imulungu, yalonge kwa ukutoghola kwake.
Chilumbe cha mwanduso tsachoneka ka simba, cha keli choneka ka ng'ombe, na cha kadatu choneka ka chihanga che imunu, na cha kane choneka ka chitema iyoghuluka.
Lelo, mwalangitse ghendo apfila pfamkala. Mleke kukala ka mwa wabotsi, ila mkale ka iwanu wane nzewele.
Mana kuduhu ubaghutsi kwa Myahudi wala kwa imunu iyali si Myahudi bae, kwaapfila Imulungu ka Imtwatsa we iwanu wose na kamluso kwe iwanu wose iwomlomba,
Kwaapfila Kiristu hayatsile, ghamalaghitso ghatimila, ili chila munu iyotoghola yapetighwe kanogha kwe Imulungu.
Mleke ukwalangula mne mbuli yoyose, ila kwa chila chinu mumlongele Imulungu kwa kulomba aghala ghambama na kwa kumlongela mighede.
Apfo agha ghose ghalawila ili kutukanya tuleke kuwa iwanu wa kusulukila ghehile ka wawo pfawasulukile.

Na nondo ayo haipfughule lwina lwa kwingilila mne lipondo lyang'alitsigha, hosi lilawa kulawa mne lwina alwo ilyoneke ka hosi lya tanuri kulu, litsuwa na mlanga kughelighwa chisi kwa hosi ililawile ako.
Apfo imunu wowose aleke kumtendela totso myaghe au kumbunza ndughu yake mne chinu chino, kwaapfila Imtwatsa iyo iyatsowahigha awa wose, ka pfatulongole kuwalongela na kuwakanya ghendo.
Apfo, imunu ang'awa mghati mwa Kiristu, ayo ka chilumbe cha sambi, ghumwande ghahupa, ghawa gha sambi.
Kwaapfila Aba komnoghela Imwana na komlangusa ghose ghayotenda. Kuya katsomlangusa ipfinu pfikulu pfa kusang'ana kubita pfino, namwe mtsokangawala.
Imunu iyang'ali yakwiba, yaleke kwiba keli, ila yasang'ane ng'onde inoghile kwa ghamoko ghake yapate ichinu chokuwagholela iwalihela chinu.
Hamwe na hagho, mnyandalile hanu ho kuwasa, kwaapfila nololela Imulungu katsakwidika ghamumlomba na nene nitsomwangilani.

Mleke kusolighwa ne ghamalangulitso ghangi, pfinogha mimoyo yetu ighelighwe ngupfu kwa uluso we Imulungu, wala si kwa malaghitso ghe ipfijo bae, kwaapfila malaghitso agho ng'aghawapfile bae awala iwaghawinzile.
Lelo twowalomba wandughu, muwatoghole awala iwosang'ana mghati mwenu, iwowalongotsa na iwowemileni mne ughima wa Chikiristu.
Aba wake na mai wake walonga apfi kwaapfila wang'ali wowapfuka iwakulu wa Wayahudi, kwaapfila tsawalonga imunu wowose iyolonga Yesu ka Kiristu katsowingighwa mne Ing'anda ye Kulombela.
Twetwe twa iwanu iwengile ngoma ghendo, si wawo bae, kwaapfila twetwe twomtamanila Imulungu kubitila Ghumuhe wake, na tweghoda kwa kwilunga na Kiristu Yesu, wala ng'atuhuwila lukuli bae.
Na laghitso lyake ilyo lino, tulitoghole taghwa lya Yesu Kiristu, Imwanaghe, na twinoghele twetwe kwa twetwe ka pfayatulaghitse.
Kuya nimwona imnyama yungi mkali, kolawa mdongo. Tsakakala na membe mbili ka tsa mwanang'olo, lekeni kalonga ka tsoka kulu.
Ndughu tsangu mleke kutonga ka iwana wadowado, lekeni muwe iwana wadowado mna aghala ghehile, hamtonga muwe ka iwanu wabala.
Pfii hana imunu iyoghaya mghati mwenu? Yamlombe Imulungu. Pfii hana munu iyodeng'elela? Na yembe wila wa kumtunya Imulungu.
Lelo mghaghume ngupfu ghamoko ghenu ighaleghele, kuya mgholose ghamaghoti ghenu ighaleghele.
Hamumlomba Imulungu, mwomkema Aba, mmanye ka yeye komuhigha chila munu ka pfayatendile, Imulungu ng'obaghula bae, apfo mkale muisi mno ka iwahenza kwa kumpfuka Imulungu.
Mdudumile ili mtende ghobama Imulungu na kubokela achila chawalongele.
Ukumtoghola Imulungu kuko kumanya kwa hakika aghala ghatubeta, na kutoghola ghendo aghala yang'aghakoneka bae.
Lelo kwa taghwa lya Imtwatsa, nomkanyani; mleke kughendelela kukala ka iwanu ing'awommanya Imulungu, iwakwalangula mbuli tsa ubwotsi
Lelo mleke kutoghola imunu wowose yawekele malaghitso mne ichijo au choukunwa, au mne ichihungo au kwa ukulawa kwa ghumwetsi, au kwa Litsuwa lya Sabato.
Apfo wa hambele he chighoda che undewa cha Imulungu, na womsang'anila chilo na misi mne ing'anda yake, na ayula iyokala mchighoda che undewa katsokala nawo na kuwalolesa.
Lekeni Pauli kahulumka hasi, kamwinamila, kamkumbatila msongolo ayo. Kalonga, “Mleke kupfuka, kamghima!”
Apfo nodudumila pfinu pfose kwaajili ye iwasaghulighwe ne Imulungu ili nawo wapate ukombotsi iuli mghati mwa Kiristu Yesu, hamwe ne utunitso wa ghamatsuwa ghose.
Mwilamse kwa ukwinoghela. Mkale tseghamba mwemwe wose imli mghati mwa Kiristu.
Chila imunu yamtegheletse myaghe kwaajili ya kumpfuka Kiristu.

Lekeni mwemwe sale tsangu, kwaapfila ma tsamuimanya mbuli ino, mwalangitse mleke kwaghisighwa ne matotso gha malangulitso gha ughutsu ghe iwanu ing'awokinda ghamalaghitso, ili mleke ukughwa kulawa hanu hamwimile.
Mwemwe wehe, muwahulikitse iwamale wenu, apfo pfipfo pfayobama Imtwatsa.
Awala iwoghendelela kutenda nzambi muwakembele hambele he iwanu, ili iwanu wangi wapfuke.
Apfo tuleke kwihighana, ila mwalangitse, imunu aleke kutenda chinu chochose ichimuhonza myaghe yekwale au yaghwe mnzambi.
Lekeni Imulungu katsowatunya, katsowatoghola, na katsoweka tseghamba iwanu wala iwotenda ghanoghile, tanu Wayahudi kuya awala iwali si Wayahudi bae.
Tsawatsima milambi ya ghumoto, tsawahoneka kukomighwa kwa imimaghe. Hawang'ali wahela tsingupfu, waghumighwa tsingupfu, tsawakala ne ngupfu mng'ondo, wawawinga asikali wahenza.
Kulawa sambi munu wowose aleke kunitsupfa keli, mana nna ng'opfu mlukuli mwangu kwaapfila nene na mtumwa wa Yesu Kiristu.
Kuya malaika yane ngupfu kadondola libwe ka libwe kulu lya kusaghila, kalyasa mwibahali, kalonga, “Apfi pfipfo Babeli pfautsohinyighwa na ukwagha ghendo.
Lekeni mwemwe, sale tsangu, mwongetse ukutoghola kwenu ikwenzeluke ghendo na mlombe kwa ngupfu ya Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka.
Mleke kughawinza keli aghala ighali muisi mno, Imulungu na yaghaluse mbutsi tsenu, ili mdahe kughamanya aghala ghoyobama Imulungu. Mtange chihi chinoghile na chihi ichimnoghela yeye na ichitimilike.
Kwaapfila nene na mtumighwa mdodo, sinoghile bae kukemighwa mtumighwa, kwaapfila tsanighadununza makingili ghe iwanu we Imulungu.
Mleke kuinoghela iisi wala ipfinu ipfili muisi. Ka mwoinoghela iisi, ng'amumnoghela Aba bae.
Apfo ghwe miyangu, ka kwowahigha iwanu wangi, ng'udaha bae kwiyamila hata ka uli nani. Kwaapfila hauwahigha wanu wangi aku naghwe koghatenda aghala ghawotenda wawo, kwehigha imwenyegho.

Apfo, Jakobu, Kefa na Yohane iwakoneka pfilongotsi, hawamanyile ka Imulungu kangaya isang'ano ino, watukinda ghamoko nene na Balinaba ka chitango kulangusa twetwe na wawo twawamwe. Twetwe tughende kusang'ana kwa Iwanu iwali si Wayahudi bae, nawo wasang'ane kwa Wayahudi.

Asikali hawamuwambile Yesu, wasola ghamaghwanda ghake, waghaghola mabughulu mane, chila bughulu kwa asikali yumwe. Pfipfila wasola na lighwanda lyake ing'alisonighwe bae, ilifumighwe kwandusila mchanya mbaka hasi.
Lelo ghweghwe yuwalangulitsa weyagho, ule ng'awilangulitsa mwenyegho bae? Kwowapetela weyagho waleke kwiba, pfii ghweghwe mwenyegho ng'ukwiba bae?
Apfi ng'ammanyile bae ka ng'uli tsenu tsa ing'anda ye Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka, iyali mghati mwenu, iyamumbokele kulawa kwe Imulungu? Apfo mwemwe mwa wanu we Imulungu.
Mana unoghelo wa Kiristu wotulongotsa, sambi twotanga ka imunu yumwe tsakafa kwaajili ya wose, apfo wose tufa hamwe naye.
Apfo ndughu tsangu iwanu we Imulungu, imkemighwe ne Imulungu, mmwalangule Yesu, Imtumighwa na Mtambika mkulu we inoghola yatuilonga toitoghola.

Mne chila chinu chanendile, tsaniwalangusa ka kwa kusang'ana ka pfino, twobamighwa kuwapfila iwanu walihela ingupfu, mkumbuke chayalongile Imtwatsa Yesu imwenyegho, ‘Kabweda ayula iyoghola kubita ayula iyobokela.’ ”
Iwanu iwekwelile wehulikitse, mmale au mwehe yaleke kuwasa ne imunu yungi. Imulungu katsowahigha waghoni na watsinzi.
Kenama kasungulila mghati, tsakona sanda, lekeni ng'engile bae mghati.
Kuya kulawila lumwesa, litsi, mdumo na mdedemo mkulu we isi. Mdedemo ka awo ng'ana ulawile bae kulawa Imulungu hayamlumbe imunu.

Baho nighwa mmaghulu mwake nimtamanile. Lekeni yeye kanongela, “Uleke kutenda apfo! Nene na mtumwa miyenu ghweghwe na ndughu tsako iwolonga imbuli ya Yesu. Mtamanile Imulungu! Kwaapfila iwanu iwolonga mbuli tsa ukalangama wa Yesu wolongotsighwa na Ghumuhe iyawalongotse manabii.”
Lekeni Imulungu katughubulila chinu acho kubitila Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka. Kwaapfila Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka kosakula chila chinu hata ipfinu ipfili mghati mwe Imulungu.
Mumbokele kwa kudeng'ela ka ndughu mne Imtwatsa. Muwatoghole iwanu ka yeye.
Namwe iwana muwahulikitse aba tsenu na mai tsenu mna ghose, mana apfo pfipfo pfaimnoghelesa Imtwatsa.

Twetwe tweghodela chinu chimwe, mimoyo yetu yotulangusa ka kukala kwetu muisi amu, hasa na mwemwe, tukala kwa uhenzeluka na ghumoyo ghunoghile ghwatwing'ighwe ne Imulungu. Ng'atulongotsighwe ne tsimbutsi tse iwanu bae, ila twolongotsighwa ne uluso we Imulungu.
“Iwanu wala iwobokela ghamalaghitso ghangu na kughakinda, iwanuwo woninoghela. Aba wangu katsowanoghela iwanu wala iwonoghela nene, pfipfila nene nitsowanoghela na nitselangusa kuna wawo.”
Kweli malaghitso agho ghakoneka gha inzewele mne ukutamanila kwawetungile iwenyegho, na mne uenyepfale, na mne kulutawala lukuli kwa ukali, lekeni ghahela ingupfu ye ukughoma dong'o tse lukuli.
Iwanu awo walilongela kanisa lya hano mbuli tse unoghelo wako. Kutsotenda ghoya ung'awapfila waghendelele ne ghumwanza ghwawo kwa inzila iimnoghela Imulungu.
Utsileme mbuli tsa ubotsi na itsilihela mana, kwaapfila kwomanya tsoghala ukwisonga.

Lekeni twetwe wose tune pfihanga ing'apfighubikwe bae, twakona ka mne chilolelo utunitso we Imtwatsa, na twetwe twotendighwa twighale naye kwa kongetseka mne utunitso iulawa kwe Imtwatsa, ayo iyo Ghumuhe.

lelo pfii idamu ya Yesu Kiristu, ambe unogha ghendo? Yeye kwa ingupfu ya Ghumuhe iyokala ghamatsuwa ghose, tsakelapfa imwenyegho yawe nambiko inoghile, iitsotutenda mimoyo yetu yele ghendo kulawa mne ghamatendo ghetu ghehile, ili tumsang'anile Imulungu iyali mghima!
Apfo ka Imulungu kaweng'a iwanu iwali si Wayahudi nzawadi iila iyatwing'ile twetwe yatumtoghola Imtwatsa Yesu Kiristu, lelo nene nani nimpinge Imulungu?”
Mleke kumghela usungu Ghumuhe Mwenzeluka we Imulungu, mana yeye ka chitango che Imulungu kuna mwemwe ka mwemwe mwa wanu wake, naye kolangusa ka litsuwa lyakutsa Imulungu katsomkombolani.
Ghakumbuke ghose ghubokele na ghuhulike, ghakinde ghendo, uleke kutenda keli nzambi. Lekeni ka ng'ukala meso bae, nitsokutsila kwa kwidukitsa ka mbapfi, na wala ng'utsomanya bae nitsakutsa tsuwachi.
Wanangu, imunu wowose aleke kuwabughani. Imunu iyotenda pfinu ipfimnoghelesa Imulungu, ayo komnoghelesa Imulungu, ka Kiristu pfayomnoghelesa Imulungu.

Sale tsangu, mleke kumtoghola chila munu iyolonga kolongotsighwa na Ghumuhe we Imulungu, ila mumghetse mlole ka imunu ayo kolongotsighwa ne Ghumuhe we Imulungu au bae, kwaapfila manabii wengi we ughutsu walawila muisi.
“Apfo wandughu tsangu nobama mmanye ka kubitila Yesu, imbuli ya kuleghusighwa nzambi yopetighwa kuna mwemwe,
Kuya ndughu tsangu deng'elelani kukala mghati mwe Imtwatsa. Sikwipfa bae ukwandika ghaghala ghanongole ukumwandikilani, kwaapfila agha ghatsomtendani mwemwe mwalangitse.
Imunu ang'awa ne nzala, aje ukaye yake ili hamtingana kuleke kuwa ne ukuhighighwa ne Imulungu. Lekeni agho ghangi, nitsowalangulitsani hanikutsa.
Pilato kawedika, “Msoleni mkamuhighe kwa ghamalaghitso ghenu.” Wayahudi wamwidika, “Ng'atubamighwa bae kumkoma imunu wowose.”
Apfo mbame pfigholelo pfikulu. Nani leloli nowalangusa nzila inoghile kubita nzila tsose.
Kwaapfila tsaibamighwa tuwe na mtambika mkulu ka yuno iyali mwenzeluka, iyalihela totso lyolyose wala nzambi, yabaghulighwe kutali na wane nzambi, na yenulighwe kubita kulanga.
Noghadaha ghose kubitila Kiristu iyongaya tsingupfu.
Imulungu kowabama muwe wahenzeluka na mleke ghendo ughoni.
Mumlombe Imulungu bila ukwipfa, na hamlomba mwalangitse na mlonge imighede kwe Imulungu.
Musa hahulike apfo, katsuma kaghenda kukala mne isi ya Midiyani. Ako tsakapata iwana weli.
Immale ng'obamighwa bae yaghubike litwi lyake, kwaapfila yeye keghala ne Imulungu na ka utunitso we Imulungu. Lekeni ipinga ka utunitso we immale.
Tindiwalo lya Kiristu litawale mne imimoyo yenu. Kwaapfila Imulungu kawakema mwemwe kuwa ne tindiwalo alyo mne lukuli lumwe. Kuya mlongeghe mighede.

Tsaikala pfinogha ghendo Imulungu iyolumba na ukukindilisa ipfinu pfose, yamtende Yesu kuwa mkamilifu kwa inzila ye ukudununzika, ili yawaghale iwanu wengi mne utunitso wake. Kwaapfila Yesu iyo iyowalongotsa mne ukombotsi.
Chihi ichiwatenda mwitowe na mwighobole mghati mwenu? Si tsitamaa tsenu tsihile bae itsitowagha mghati mwe ng'uli tsenu?
Sambi yolongighwa ghendo ka mghati mwenu kuna ughoni, na ughoni awo ng'ana woneke bae hata kwe iwanu ing'awammanyile Imulungu. Imunu kowasa na imwehe wa aba wake!
